                     <div class="line">Some touches of remorse? or is your blood</div>
                     <div class="line">So madly hot that no discourse of reason,</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor fear of bad success in a bad cause,</div>
                     <div class="line">Can qualify the same?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, brother Hector,</div>
                     <div class="line">We may not think the justness of each act</div>
                     <div class="line">Such and no other than event doth form it,</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor once deject the courage of our minds,</div>
                     <div class="line">Because Cassandra's mad: her brain-sick raptures</div>
                     <div class="line">Cannot distaste the goodness of a quarrel</div>
                     <div class="line">Which hath our several honours all engaged</div>
                     <div class="line">To make it gracious. For my private part,</div>
                     <div class="line">I am no more touch'd than all Priam's sons:</div>
                     <div class="line">And Jove forbid there should be done amongst us</div>
                     <div class="line">Such things as might offend the weakest spleen</div>
                     <div class="line">To fight for and maintain!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                     <div class="line">Else might the world convince of levity</div>
                     <div class="line">As well my undertakings as your counsels:</div>
                     <div class="line">But I attest the gods, your full consent</div>
                     <div class="line">Gave wings to my propension and cut off</div>
                     <div class="line">All fears attending on so dire a project.</div>
                     <div class="line">For what, alas, can these my single arms?</div>
                     <div class="line">What Propugnation is in one man's valour,</div>
                     <div class="line">To stand the push and enmity of those</div>
                     <div class="line">This quarrel would excite? Yet, I protest,</div>
                     <div class="line">Were I alone to pass the difficulties</div>
                     <div class="line">And had as ample power as I have will,</div>
                     <div class="line">Paris should ne'er retract what he hath done,</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor faint in the pursuit.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRIAM</div>
                     <div class="line">Paris, you speak</div>
                     <div class="line">Like one besotted on your sweet delights:</div>
                     <div class="line">You have the honey still, but these the gall;</div>
                     <div class="line">So to be valiant is no praise at all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, I propose not merely to myself</div>
                     <div class="line">The pleasures such a beauty brings with it;</div>
                     <div class="line">But I would have the soil of her fair rape</div>
                     <div class="line">Wiped off, in honourable keeping her.</div>
                     <div class="line">What treason were it to the ransack'd queen,</div>
                     <div class="line">Disgrace to your great worths and shame to me,</div>
                     <div class="line">Now to deliver her possession up</div>
                     <div class="line">On terms of base compulsion! Can it be</div>
                     <div class="line">That so degenerate a strain as this</div>
                     <div class="line">Should once set footing in your generous bosoms?</div>
                     <div class="line">There's not the meanest spirit on our party</div>
                     <div class="line">Without a heart to dare or sword to draw</div>
                     <div class="line">When Helen is defended, nor none so noble</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose life were ill bestow'd or death unfamed</div>
                     <div class="line">Where Helen is the subject; then, I say,</div>
                     <div class="line">Well may we fight for her whom, we know well,</div>
                     <div class="line">The world's large spaces cannot parallel.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Paris and Troilus, you have both said well,</div>
                     <div class="line">And on the cause and question now in hand</div>
                     <div class="line">Have glozed, but superficially: not much</div>
                     <div class="line">Unlike young men, whom Aristotle thought</div>
                     <div class="line">Unfit to hear moral philosophy:</div>
                     <div class="line">The reasons you allege do more conduce</div>
                     <div class="line">To the hot passion of distemper'd blood</div>
                     <div class="line">Than to make up a free determination</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twixt right and wrong, for pleasure and revenge</div>
                     <div class="line">Have ears more deaf than adders to the voice</div>
                     <div class="line">Of any true decision. Nature craves</div>
                     <div class="line">All dues be render'd to their owners: now,</div>
                     <div class="line">What nearer debt in all humanity</div>
                     <div class="line">Than wife is to the husband? If this law</div>
                     <div class="line">Of nature be corrupted through affection,</div>
                     <div class="line">And that great minds, of partial indulgence</div>
                     <div class="line">To their benumbed wills, resist the same,</div>
                     <div class="line">There is a law in each well-order'd nation</div>
                     <div class="line">To curb those raging appetites that are</div>
                     <div class="line">Most disobedient and refractory.</div>
                     <div class="line">If Helen then be wife to Sparta's king,</div>
                     <div class="line">As it is known she is, these moral laws</div>
                     <div class="line">Of nature and of nations speak aloud</div>
                     <div class="line">To have her back return'd: thus to persist</div>
                     <div class="line">In doing wrong extenuates not wrong,</div>
                     <div class="line">But makes it much more heavy. Hector's opinion</div>
                     <div class="line">Is this in way of truth; yet ne'ertheless,</div>
                     <div class="line">My spritely brethren, I propend to you</div>
                     <div class="line">In resolution to keep Helen still,</div>
                     <div class="line">For 'tis a cause that hath no mean dependance</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon our joint and several dignities.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, there you touch'd the life of our design:</div>
                     <div class="line">Were it not glory that we more affected</div>
                     <div class="line">Than the performance of our heaving spleens,</div>
                     <div class="line">I would not wish a drop of Trojan blood</div>
                     <div class="line">Spent more in her defence. But, worthy Hector,</div>
                     <div class="line">She is a theme of honour and renown,</div>
                     <div class="line">A spur to valiant and magnanimous deeds,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose present courage may beat down our foes,</div>
                     <div class="line">And fame in time to come canonize us;</div>
                     <div class="line">For, I presume, brave Hector would not lose</div>
                     <div class="line">So rich advantage of a promised glory</div>
                     <div class="line">As smiles upon the forehead of this action</div>
                     <div class="line">For the wide world's revenue.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">I am yours,</div>
                     <div class="line">You valiant offspring of great Priamus.</div>
                     <div class="line">I have a roisting challenge sent amongst</div>
                     <div class="line">The dun and factious nobles of the Greeks</div>
                     <div class="line">Will strike amazement to their drowsy spirits:</div>
                     <div class="line">I was advertised their great general slept,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whilst emulation in the army crept:</div>
                     <div class="line">This, I presume, will wake him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.5.4">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>3. SCENE III.  The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter THERSITES, solus</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">How now, Thersites! what lost in the labyrinth of</div>
                     <div class="line">thy fury! Shall the elephant Ajax carry it thus? He</div>
                     <div class="line">beats me, and I rail at him: O, worthy satisfaction!</div>
                     <div class="line">would it were otherwise; that I could beat him,</div>
                     <div class="line">whilst he railed at me. 'Sfoot, I'll learn to</div>
                     <div class="line">conjure and raise devils, but I'll see some issue of</div>
                     <div class="line">my spiteful execrations. Then there's Achilles, a</div>
                     <div class="line">rare enginer! If Troy be not taken till these two</div>
                     <div class="line">undermine it, the walls will stand till they fall of</div>
                     <div class="line">themselves. O thou great thunder-darter of Olympus,</div>
                     <div class="line">forget that thou art Jove, the king of gods and,</div>
                     <div class="line">Mercury, lose all the serpentine craft of thy</div>
                     <div class="line">caduceus, if ye take not that little, little less</div>
                     <div class="line">than little wit from them that they have! which</div>
                     <div class="line">short-armed ignorance itself knows is so abundant</div>
                     <div class="line">scarce, it will not in circumvention deliver a fly</div>
                     <div class="line">from a spider, without drawing their massy irons and</div>
                     <div class="line">cutting the web. After this, the vengeance on the</div>
                     <div class="line">whole camp! or rather, the bone-ache! for that,</div>
                     <div class="line">methinks, is the curse dependent on those that war</div>
                     <div class="line">for a placket. I have said my prayers and devil Envy</div>
                     <div class="line">say Amen. What ho! my Lord Achilles!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter PATROCLUS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Who's there? Thersites! Good Thersites, come in and rail.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">If I could have remembered a gilt counterfeit, thou</div>
                     <div class="line">wouldst not have slipped out of my contemplation: but</div>
                     <div class="line">it is no matter; thyself upon thyself! The common</div>
                     <div class="line">curse of mankind, folly and ignorance, be thine in</div>
                     <div class="line">great revenue! heaven bless thee from a tutor, and</div>
                     <div class="line">discipline come not near thee! Let thy blood be thy</div>
                     <div class="line">direction till thy death! then if she that lays thee</div>
                     <div class="line">out says thou art a fair corse, I'll be sworn and</div>
                     <div class="line">sworn upon't she never shrouded any but lazars.</div>
                     <div class="line">Amen. Where's Achilles?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">What, art thou devout? wast thou in prayer?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay: the heavens hear me!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ACHILLES</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">Who's there?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Thersites, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">Where, where? Art thou come? why, my cheese, my</div>
                     <div class="line">digestion, why hast thou not served thyself in to</div>
                     <div class="line">my table so many meals? Come, what's Agamemnon?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy commander, Achilles. Then tell me, Patroclus,</div>
                     <div class="line">what's Achilles?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy lord, Thersites: then tell me, I pray thee,</div>
                     <div class="line">what's thyself?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy knower, Patroclus: then tell me, Patroclus,</div>
                     <div class="line">what art thou?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou mayst tell that knowest.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">O, tell, tell.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll decline the whole question. Agamemnon commands</div>
                     <div class="line">Achilles; Achilles is my lord; I am Patroclus'</div>
                     <div class="line">knower, and Patroclus is a fool.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">You rascal!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Peace, fool! I have not done.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">He is a privileged man. Proceed, Thersites.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Agamemnon is a fool; Achilles is a fool; Thersites</div>
                     <div class="line">is a fool, and, as aforesaid, Patroclus is a fool.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">Derive this; come.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Agamemnon is a fool to offer to command Achilles;</div>
                     <div class="line">Achilles is a fool to be commanded of Agamemnon;</div>
                     <div class="line">Thersites is a fool to serve such a fool, and</div>
                     <div class="line">Patroclus is a fool positive.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Why am I a fool?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Make that demand of the prover. It suffices me thou</div>
                     <div class="line">art. Look you, who comes here?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">Patroclus, I'll speak with nobody.</div>
                     <div class="line">Come in with me, Thersites.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Here is such patchery, such juggling and such</div>
                     <div class="line">knavery! all the argument is a cuckold and a</div>
                     <div class="line">whore; a good quarrel to draw emulous factions</div>
                     <div class="line">and bleed to death upon. Now, the dry serpigo on</div>
                     <div class="line">the subject! and war and lechery confound all!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <p>Enter AGAMEMNON, ULYSSES, NESTOR, DIOMEDES, and AJAX</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">Where is Achilles?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Within his tent; but ill disposed, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">Let it be known to him that we are here.</div>
                     <div class="line">He shent our messengers; and we lay by</div>
                     <div class="line">Our appertainments, visiting of him:</div>
                     <div class="line">Let him be told so; lest perchance he think</div>
                     <div class="line">We dare not move the question of our place,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or know not what we are.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I shall say so to him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">We saw him at the opening of his tent:</div>
                     <div class="line">He is not sick.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">Yes, lion-sick, sick of proud heart: you may call it</div>
                     <div class="line">melancholy, if you will favour the man; but, by my</div>
                     <div class="line">head, 'tis pride: but why, why? let him show us the</div>
                     <div class="line">cause. A word, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Takes AGAMEMNON aside</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">What moves Ajax thus to bay at him?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Achilles hath inveigled his fool from him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Who, Thersites?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">He.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Then will Ajax lack matter, if he have lost his argument.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">No, you see, he is his argument that has his</div>
                     <div class="line">argument, Achilles.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">All the better; their fraction is more our wish than</div>
                     <div class="line">their faction: but it was a strong composure a fool</div>
                     <div class="line">could disunite.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">The amity that wisdom knits not, folly may easily</div>
                     <div class="line">untie. Here comes Patroclus.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter PATROCLUS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">No Achilles with him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">The elephant hath joints, but none for courtesy:</div>
                     <div class="line">his legs are legs for necessity, not for flexure.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Achilles bids me say, he is much sorry,</div>
                     <div class="line">If any thing more than your sport and pleasure</div>
                     <div class="line">Did move your greatness and this noble state</div>
                     <div class="line">To call upon him; he hopes it is no other</div>
                     <div class="line">But for your health and your digestion sake,</div>
                     <div class="line">And after-dinner's breath.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">Hear you, Patroclus:</div>
                     <div class="line">We are too well acquainted with these answers:</div>
                     <div class="line">But his evasion, wing'd thus swift with scorn,</div>
                     <div class="line">Cannot outfly our apprehensions.</div>
                     <div class="line">Much attribute he hath, and much the reason</div>
                     <div class="line">Why we ascribe it to him; yet all his virtues,</div>
                     <div class="line">Not virtuously on his own part beheld,</div>
                     <div class="line">Do in our eyes begin to lose their gloss,</div>
                     <div class="line">Yea, like fair fruit in an unwholesome dish,</div>
                     <div class="line">Are like to rot untasted. Go and tell him,</div>
                     <div class="line">We come to speak with him; and you shall not sin,</div>
                     <div class="line">If you do say we think him over-proud</div>
                     <div class="line">And under-honest, in self-assumption greater</div>
                     <div class="line">Than in the note of judgment; and worthier</div>
                     <div class="line">than himself</div>
                     <div class="line">Here tend the savage strangeness he puts on,</div>
                     <div class="line">Disguise the holy strength of their command,</div>
                     <div class="line">And underwrite in an observing kind</div>
                     <div class="line">His humorous predominance; yea, watch</div>
                     <div class="line">His pettish lunes, his ebbs, his flows, as if</div>
                     <div class="line">The passage and whole carriage of this action</div>
                     <div class="line">Rode on his tide. Go tell him this, and add,</div>
                     <div class="line">That if he overhold his price so much,</div>
                     <div class="line">We'll none of him; but let him, like an engine</div>
                     <div class="line">Not portable, lie under this report:</div>
                     <div class="line">'Bring action hither, this cannot go to war:</div>
                     <div class="line">A stirring dwarf we do allowance give</div>
                     <div class="line">Before a sleeping giant.' Tell him so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I shall; and bring his answer presently.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">In second voice we'll not be satisfied;</div>
                     <div class="line">We come to speak with him. Ulysses, enter you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit ULYSSES</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">What is he more than another?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">No more than what he thinks he is.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">Is he so much? Do you not think he thinks himself a</div>
                     <div class="line">better man than I am?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">No question.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">Will you subscribe his thought, and say he is?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">No, noble Ajax; you are as strong, as valiant, as</div>
                     <div class="line">wise, no less noble, much more gentle, and altogether</div>
                     <div class="line">more tractable.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">Why should a man be proud? How doth pride grow? I</div>
                     <div class="line">know not what pride is.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">Your mind is the clearer, Ajax, and your virtues the</div>
                     <div class="line">fairer. He that is proud eats up himself: pride is</div>
                     <div class="line">his own glass, his own trumpet, his own chronicle;</div>
                     <div class="line">and whatever praises itself but in the deed, devours</div>
                     <div class="line">the deed in the praise.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">I do hate a proud man, as I hate the engendering of toads.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet he loves himself: is't not strange?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Aside</p>
               <p>Re-enter ULYSSES</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Achilles will not to the field to-morrow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">What's his excuse?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">He doth rely on none,</div>
                     <div class="line">But carries on the stream of his dispose</div>
                     <div class="line">Without observance or respect of any,</div>
                     <div class="line">In will peculiar and in self-admission.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">Why will he not upon our fair request</div>
                     <div class="line">Untent his person and share the air with us?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Things small as nothing, for request's sake only,</div>
                     <div class="line">He makes important: possess'd he is with greatness,</div>
                     <div class="line">And speaks not to himself but with a pride</div>
                     <div class="line">That quarrels at self-breath: imagined worth</div>
                     <div class="line">Holds in his blood such swoln and hot discourse</div>
                     <div class="line">That 'twixt his mental and his active parts</div>
                     <div class="line">Kingdom'd Achilles in commotion rages</div>
                     <div class="line">And batters down himself: what should I say?</div>
                     <div class="line">He is so plaguy proud that the death-tokens of it</div>
                     <div class="line">Cry 'No recovery.'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">Let Ajax go to him.</div>
                     <div class="line">Dear lord, go you and greet him in his tent:</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis said he holds you well, and will be led</div>
                     <div class="line">At your request a little from himself.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">O Agamemnon, let it not be so!</div>
                     <div class="line">We'll consecrate the steps that Ajax makes</div>
                     <div class="line">When they go from Achilles: shall the proud lord</div>
                     <div class="line">That bastes his arrogance with his own seam</div>
                     <div class="line">And never suffers matter of the world</div>
                     <div class="line">Enter his thoughts, save such as do revolve</div>
                     <div class="line">And ruminate himself, shall he be worshipp'd</div>
                     <div class="line">Of that we hold an idol more than he?</div>
                     <div class="line">No, this thrice worthy and right valiant lord</div>
                     <div class="line">Must not so stale his palm, nobly acquired;</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor, by my will, assubjugate his merit,</div>
                     <div class="line">As amply titled as Achilles is,</div>
                     <div class="line">By going to Achilles:</div>
                     <div class="line">That were to enlard his fat already pride</div>
                     <div class="line">And add more coals to Cancer when he burns</div>
                     <div class="line">With entertaining great Hyperion.</div>
                     <div class="line">This lord go to him! Jupiter forbid,</div>
                     <div class="line">And say in thunder 'Achilles go to him.'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to DIOMEDES</span>  O, this is well; he rubs the</div>
                     <div class="line">vein of him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to NESTOR</span>  And how his silence drinks up</div>
                     <div class="line">this applause!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">If I go to him, with my armed fist I'll pash him o'er the face.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">O, no, you shall not go.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">An a' be proud with me, I'll pheeze his pride:</div>
                     <div class="line">Let me go to him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Not for the worth that hangs upon our quarrel.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">A paltry, insolent fellow!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">How he describes himself!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">Can he not be sociable?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">The raven chides blackness.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll let his humours blood.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">He will be the physician that should be the patient.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">An all men were o' my mind,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Wit would be out of fashion.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">A' should not bear it so, a' should eat swords first:</div>
                     <div class="line">shall pride carry it?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">An 'twould, you'ld carry half.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">A' would have ten shares.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">I will knead him; I'll make him supple.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">He's not yet through warm: force him with praises:</div>
                     <div class="line">pour in, pour in; his ambition is dry.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>To AGAMEMNON</span>  My lord, you feed too much on this dislike.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Our noble general, do not do so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">You must prepare to fight without Achilles.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, 'tis this naming of him does him harm.</div>
                     <div class="line">Here is a man--but 'tis before his face;</div>
                     <div class="line">I will be silent.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Wherefore should you so?</div>
                     <div class="line">He is not emulous, as Achilles is.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Know the whole world, he is as valiant.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">A whoreson dog, that shall pelter thus with us!</div>
                     <div class="line">Would he were a Trojan!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">What a vice were it in Ajax now,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">If he were proud,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">Or covetous of praise,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, or surly borne,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">Or strange, or self-affected!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Thank the heavens, lord, thou art of sweet composure;</div>
                     <div class="line">Praise him that got thee, she that gave thee suck:</div>
                     <div class="line">Famed be thy tutor, and thy parts of nature</div>
                     <div class="line">Thrice famed, beyond all erudition:</div>
                     <div class="line">But he that disciplined thy arms to fight,</div>
                     <div class="line">Let Mars divide eternity in twain,</div>
                     <div class="line">And give him half: and, for thy vigour,</div>
                     <div class="line">Bull-bearing Milo his addition yield</div>
                     <div class="line">To sinewy Ajax. I will not praise thy wisdom,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which, like a bourn, a pale, a shore, confines</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy spacious and dilated parts: here's Nestor;</div>
                     <div class="line">Instructed by the antiquary times,</div>
                     <div class="line">He must, he is, he cannot but be wise:</div>
                     <div class="line">Put pardon, father Nestor, were your days</div>
                     <div class="line">As green as Ajax' and your brain so temper'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">You should not have the eminence of him,</div>
                     <div class="line">But be as Ajax.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall I call you father?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, my good son.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">Be ruled by him, Lord Ajax.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">There is no tarrying here; the hart Achilles</div>
                     <div class="line">Keeps thicket. Please it our great general</div>
                     <div class="line">To call together all his state of war;</div>
                     <div class="line">Fresh kings are come to Troy: to-morrow</div>
                     <div class="line">We must with all our main of power stand fast:</div>
                     <div class="line">And here's a lord,--come knights from east to west,</div>
                     <div class="line">And cull their flower, Ajax shall cope the best.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">Go we to council. Let Achilles sleep:</div>
                     <div class="line">Light boats sail swift, though greater hulks draw deep.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.6">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 3. ACT III</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  Troy. Priam's palace.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II.  The same. Pandarus' orchard.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.6.4">3. SCENE III.  The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.6.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  Troy. Priam's palace.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter a Servant and PANDARUS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Friend, you! pray you, a word: do not you follow</div>
                     <div class="line">the young Lord Paris?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, sir, when he goes before me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">You depend upon him, I mean?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, I do depend upon the lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">You depend upon a noble gentleman; I must needs</div>
                     <div class="line">praise him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">The lord be praised!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">You know me, do you not?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">Faith, sir, superficially.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Friend, know me better; I am the Lord Pandarus.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">I hope I shall know your honour better.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I do desire it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">You are in the state of grace.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Grace! not so, friend: honour and lordship are my titles.</div>
                     <p>Music within</p>
                     <div class="line">What music is this?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">I do but partly know, sir: it is music in parts.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Know you the musicians?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">Wholly, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Who play they to?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">To the hearers, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">At whose pleasure, friend</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">At mine, sir, and theirs that love music.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Command, I mean, friend.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">Who shall I command, sir?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Friend, we understand not one another: I am too</div>
                     <div class="line">courtly and thou art too cunning. At whose request</div>
                     <div class="line">do these men play?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">That's to 't indeed, sir: marry, sir, at the request</div>
                     <div class="line">of Paris my lord, who's there in person; with him,</div>
                     <div class="line">the mortal Venus, the heart-blood of beauty, love's</div>
                     <div class="line">invisible soul,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Who, my cousin Cressida?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">No, sir, Helen: could you not find out that by her</div>
                     <div class="line">attributes?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">It should seem, fellow, that thou hast not seen the</div>
                     <div class="line">Lady Cressida. I come to speak with Paris from the</div>
                     <div class="line">Prince Troilus: I will make a complimental assault</div>
                     <div class="line">upon him, for my business seethes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">Sodden business! there's a stewed phrase indeed!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter PARIS and HELEN, attended</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Fair be to you, my lord, and to all this fair</div>
                     <div class="line">company! fair desires, in all fair measure,</div>
                     <div class="line">fairly guide them! especially to you, fair queen!</div>
                     <div class="line">fair thoughts be your fair pillow!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HELEN</div>
                     <div class="line">Dear lord, you are full of fair words.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">You speak your fair pleasure, sweet queen. Fair</div>
                     <div class="line">prince, here is good broken music.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                     <div class="line">You have broke it, cousin: and, by my life, you</div>
                     <div class="line">shall make it whole again; you shall piece it out</div>
                     <div class="line">with a piece of your performance. Nell, he is full</div>
                     <div class="line">of harmony.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Truly, lady, no.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HELEN</div>
                     <div class="line">O, sir,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Rude, in sooth; in good sooth, very rude.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                     <div class="line">Well said, my lord! well, you say so in fits.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I have business to my lord, dear queen. My lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">will you vouchsafe me a word?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HELEN</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, this shall not hedge us out: we'll hear you</div>
                     <div class="line">sing, certainly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, sweet queen. you are pleasant with me. But,</div>
                     <div class="line">marry, thus, my lord: my dear lord and most esteemed</div>
                     <div class="line">friend, your brother Troilus,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HELEN</div>
                     <div class="line">My Lord Pandarus; honey-sweet lord,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Go to, sweet queen, to go:--commends himself most</div>
                     <div class="line">affectionately to you,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HELEN</div>
                     <div class="line">You shall not bob us out of our melody: if you do,</div>
                     <div class="line">our melancholy upon your head!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Sweet queen, sweet queen! that's a sweet queen, i' faith.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HELEN</div>
                     <div class="line">And to make a sweet lady sad is a sour offence.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, that shall not serve your turn; that shall not,</div>
                     <div class="line">in truth, la. Nay, I care not for such words; no,</div>
                     <div class="line">no. And, my lord, he desires you, that if the king</div>
                     <div class="line">call for him at supper, you will make his excuse.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HELEN</div>
                     <div class="line">My Lord Pandarus,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">What says my sweet queen, my very very sweet queen?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                     <div class="line">What exploit's in hand? where sups he to-night?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HELEN</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, but, my lord,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">What says my sweet queen? My cousin will fall out</div>
                     <div class="line">with you. You must not know where he sups.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll lay my life, with my disposer Cressida.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">No, no, no such matter; you are wide: come, your</div>
                     <div class="line">disposer is sick.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, I'll make excuse.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, good my lord. Why should you say Cressida? no,</div>
                     <div class="line">your poor disposer's sick.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                     <div class="line">I spy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">You spy! what do you spy? Come, give me an</div>
                     <div class="line">instrument. Now, sweet queen.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HELEN</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, this is kindly done.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">My niece is horribly in love with a thing you have,</div>
                     <div class="line">sweet queen.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HELEN</div>
                     <div class="line">She shall have it, my lord, if it be not my lord Paris.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">He! no, she'll none of him; they two are twain.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HELEN</div>
                     <div class="line">Falling in, after falling out, may make them three.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, come, I'll hear no more of this; I'll sing</div>
                     <div class="line">you a song now.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HELEN</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, ay, prithee now. By my troth, sweet lord, thou</div>
                     <div class="line">hast a fine forehead.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, you may, you may.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HELEN</div>
                     <div class="line">Let thy song be love: this love will undo us all.</div>
                     <div class="line">O Cupid, Cupid, Cupid!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Love! ay, that it shall, i' faith.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, good now, love, love, nothing but love.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">In good troth, it begins so.</div>
                     <p>Sings</p>
                     <div class="line">Love, love, nothing but love, still more!</div>
                     <div class="line">For, O, love's bow</div>
                     <div class="line">Shoots buck and doe:</div>
                     <div class="line">The shaft confounds,</div>
                     <div class="line">Not that it wounds,</div>
                     <div class="line">But tickles still the sore.</div>
                     <div class="line">These lovers cry Oh! oh! they die!</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet that which seems the wound to kill,</div>
                     <div class="line">Doth turn oh! oh! to ha! ha! he!</div>
                     <div class="line">So dying love lives still:</div>
                     <div class="line">Oh! oh! a while, but ha! ha! ha!</div>
                     <div class="line">Oh! oh! groans out for ha! ha! ha!</div>
                     <div class="line">Heigh-ho!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HELEN</div>
                     <div class="line">In love, i' faith, to the very tip of the nose.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                     <div class="line">He eats nothing but doves, love, and that breeds hot</div>
                     <div class="line">blood, and hot blood begets hot thoughts, and hot</div>
                     <div class="line">thoughts beget hot deeds, and hot deeds is love.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Is this the generation of love? hot blood, hot</div>
                     <div class="line">thoughts, and hot deeds? Why, they are vipers:</div>
                     <div class="line">is love a generation of vipers? Sweet lord, who's</div>
                     <div class="line">a-field to-day?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                     <div class="line">Hector, Deiphobus, Helenus, Antenor, and all the</div>
                     <div class="line">gallantry of Troy: I  would fain have armed to-day,</div>
                     <div class="line">but my Nell would not have it so. How chance my</div>
                     <div class="line">brother Troilus went not?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HELEN</div>
                     <div class="line">He hangs the lip at something: you know all, Lord Pandarus.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Not I, honey-sweet queen. I long to hear how they</div>
                     <div class="line">sped to-day. You'll remember your brother's excuse?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                     <div class="line">To a hair.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Farewell, sweet queen.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HELEN</div>
                     <div class="line">Commend me to your niece.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I will, sweet queen.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <p>A retreat sounded</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                     <div class="line">They're come from field: let us to Priam's hall,</div>
                     <div class="line">To greet the warriors. Sweet Helen, I must woo you</div>
                     <div class="line">To help unarm our Hector: his stubborn buckles,</div>
                     <div class="line">With these your white enchanting fingers touch'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall more obey than to the edge of steel</div>
                     <div class="line">Or force of Greekish sinews; you shall do more</div>
                     <div class="line">Than all the island kings,--disarm great Hector.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HELEN</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twill make us proud to be his servant, Paris;</div>
                     <div class="line">Yea, what he shall receive of us in duty</div>
                     <div class="line">Gives us more palm in beauty than we have,</div>
                     <div class="line">Yea, overshines ourself.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                     <div class="line">Sweet, above thought I love thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.6.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  The same. Pandarus' orchard.</h2>
