                     <div class="line">But this thy countenance, still lock'd in steel,</div>
                     <div class="line">I never saw till now. I knew thy grandsire,</div>
                     <div class="line">And once fought with him: he was a soldier good;</div>
                     <div class="line">But, by great Mars, the captain of us all,</div>
                     <div class="line">Never saw like thee. Let an old man embrace thee;</div>
                     <div class="line">And, worthy warrior, welcome to our tents.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis the old Nestor.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Let me embrace thee, good old chronicle,</div>
                     <div class="line">That hast so long walk'd hand in hand with time:</div>
                     <div class="line">Most reverend Nestor, I am glad to clasp thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">I would my arms could match thee in contention,</div>
                     <div class="line">As they contend with thee in courtesy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">I would they could.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Ha!</div>
                     <div class="line">By this white beard, I'ld fight with thee to-morrow.</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, welcome, welcome! I have seen the time.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">I wonder now how yonder city stands</div>
                     <div class="line">When we have here her base and pillar by us.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">I know your favour, Lord Ulysses, well.</div>
                     <div class="line">Ah, sir, there's many a Greek and Trojan dead,</div>
                     <div class="line">Since first I saw yourself and Diomed</div>
                     <div class="line">In Ilion, on your Greekish embassy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, I foretold you then what would ensue:</div>
                     <div class="line">My prophecy is but half his journey yet;</div>
                     <div class="line">For yonder walls, that pertly front your town,</div>
                     <div class="line">Yond towers, whose wanton tops do buss the clouds,</div>
                     <div class="line">Must kiss their own feet.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">I must not believe you:</div>
                     <div class="line">There they stand yet, and modestly I think,</div>
                     <div class="line">The fall of every Phrygian stone will cost</div>
                     <div class="line">A drop of Grecian blood: the end crowns all,</div>
                     <div class="line">And that old common arbitrator, Time,</div>
                     <div class="line">Will one day end it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">So to him we leave it.</div>
                     <div class="line">Most gentle and most valiant Hector, welcome:</div>
                     <div class="line">After the general, I beseech you next</div>
                     <div class="line">To feast with me and see me at my tent.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">I shall forestall thee, Lord Ulysses, thou!</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, Hector, I have fed mine eyes on thee;</div>
                     <div class="line">I have with exact view perused thee, Hector,</div>
                     <div class="line">And quoted joint by joint.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Is this Achilles?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">I am Achilles.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Stand fair, I pray thee: let me look on thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">Behold thy fill.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, I have done already.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou art too brief: I will the second time,</div>
                     <div class="line">As I would buy thee, view thee limb by limb.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">O, like a book of sport thou'lt read me o'er;</div>
                     <div class="line">But there's more in me than thou understand'st.</div>
                     <div class="line">Why dost thou so oppress me with thine eye?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">Tell me, you heavens, in which part of his body</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall I destroy him? whether there, or there, or there?</div>
                     <div class="line">That I may give the local wound a name</div>
                     <div class="line">And make distinct the very breach whereout</div>
                     <div class="line">Hector's great spirit flew: answer me, heavens!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">It would discredit the blest gods, proud man,</div>
                     <div class="line">To answer such a question: stand again:</div>
                     <div class="line">Think'st thou to catch my life so pleasantly</div>
                     <div class="line">As to prenominate in nice conjecture</div>
                     <div class="line">Where thou wilt hit me dead?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">I tell thee, yea.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Wert thou an oracle to tell me so,</div>
                     <div class="line">I'd not believe thee. Henceforth guard thee well;</div>
                     <div class="line">For I'll not kill thee there, nor there, nor there;</div>
                     <div class="line">But, by the forge that stithied Mars his helm,</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll kill thee every where, yea, o'er and o'er.</div>
                     <div class="line">You wisest Grecians, pardon me this brag;</div>
                     <div class="line">His insolence draws folly from my lips;</div>
                     <div class="line">But I'll endeavour deeds to match these words,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or may I never--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">Do not chafe thee, cousin:</div>
                     <div class="line">And you, Achilles, let these threats alone,</div>
                     <div class="line">Till accident or purpose bring you to't:</div>
                     <div class="line">You may have every day enough of Hector</div>
                     <div class="line">If you have stomach; the general state, I fear,</div>
                     <div class="line">Can scarce entreat you to be odd with him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray you, let us see you in the field:</div>
                     <div class="line">We have had pelting wars, since you refused</div>
                     <div class="line">The Grecians' cause.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">Dost thou entreat me, Hector?</div>
                     <div class="line">To-morrow do I meet thee, fell as death;</div>
                     <div class="line">To-night all friends.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy hand upon that match.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">First, all you peers of Greece, go to my tent;</div>
                     <div class="line">There in the full convive we: afterwards,</div>
                     <div class="line">As Hector's leisure and your bounties shall</div>
                     <div class="line">Concur together, severally entreat him.</div>
                     <div class="line">Beat loud the tabourines, let the trumpets blow,</div>
                     <div class="line">That this great soldier may his welcome know.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt all except TROILUS and ULYSSES</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">My Lord Ulysses, tell me, I beseech you,</div>
                     <div class="line">In what place of the field doth Calchas keep?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">At Menelaus' tent, most princely Troilus:</div>
                     <div class="line">There Diomed doth feast with him to-night;</div>
                     <div class="line">Who neither looks upon the heaven nor earth,</div>
                     <div class="line">But gives all gaze and bent of amorous view</div>
                     <div class="line">On the fair Cressid.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall sweet lord, be bound to you so much,</div>
                     <div class="line">After we part from Agamemnon's tent,</div>
                     <div class="line">To bring me thither?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">You shall command me, sir.</div>
                     <div class="line">As gentle tell me, of what honour was</div>
                     <div class="line">This Cressida in Troy? Had she no lover there</div>
                     <div class="line">That wails her absence?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">O, sir, to such as boasting show their scars</div>
                     <div class="line">A mock is due. Will you walk on, my lord?</div>
                     <div class="line">She was beloved, she loved; she is, and doth:</div>
                     <div class="line">But still sweet love is food for fortune's tooth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.8">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 5. ACT V</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.8.2">1. SCENE I.  The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.8.3">2. SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.8.4">3. SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.8.5">4. SCENE IV.  Plains between Troy and the Grecian camp.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.8.6">5. SCENE V.  Another part of the plains.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.8.7">6. SCENE VI.  Another part of the plains.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.8.8">7. SCENE VII.  Another part of the plains.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.8.9">8. SCENE VIII.  Another part of the plains.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.8.10">9. SCENE IX.  Another part of the plains.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.8.11">10. SCENE X.  Another part of the plains.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.8.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ACHILLES and PATROCLUS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll heat his blood with Greekish wine to-night,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which with my scimitar I'll cool to-morrow.</div>
                     <div class="line">Patroclus, let us feast him to the height.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Here comes Thersites.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter THERSITES</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">How now, thou core of envy!</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou crusty batch of nature, what's the news?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, thou picture of what thou seemest, and idol</div>
                     <div class="line">of idiot worshippers, here's a letter for thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">From whence, fragment?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, thou full dish of fool, from Troy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Who keeps the tent now?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">The surgeon's box, or the patient's wound.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Well said, adversity! and what need these tricks?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Prithee, be silent, boy; I profit not by thy talk:</div>
                     <div class="line">thou art thought to be Achilles' male varlet.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Male varlet, you rogue! what's that?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, his masculine whore. Now, the rotten diseases</div>
                     <div class="line">of the south, the guts-griping, ruptures, catarrhs,</div>
                     <div class="line">loads o' gravel i' the back, lethargies, cold</div>
                     <div class="line">palsies, raw eyes, dirt-rotten livers, wheezing</div>
                     <div class="line">lungs, bladders full of imposthume, sciaticas,</div>
                     <div class="line">limekilns i' the palm, incurable bone-ache, and the</div>
                     <div class="line">rivelled fee-simple of the tetter, take and take</div>
                     <div class="line">again such preposterous discoveries!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Why thou damnable box of envy, thou, what meanest</div>
                     <div class="line">thou to curse thus?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Do I curse thee?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Why no, you ruinous butt, you whoreson</div>
                     <div class="line">indistinguishable cur, no.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">No! why art thou then exasperate, thou idle</div>
                     <div class="line">immaterial skein of sleave-silk, thou green sarcenet</div>
                     <div class="line">flap for a sore eye, thou tassel of a prodigal's</div>
                     <div class="line">purse, thou? Ah, how the poor world is pestered</div>
                     <div class="line">with such waterflies, diminutives of nature!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Out, gall!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Finch-egg!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">My sweet Patroclus, I am thwarted quite</div>
                     <div class="line">From my great purpose in to-morrow's battle.</div>
                     <div class="line">Here is a letter from Queen Hecuba,</div>
                     <div class="line">A token from her daughter, my fair love,</div>
                     <div class="line">Both taxing me and gaging me to keep</div>
                     <div class="line">An oath that I have sworn. I will not break it:</div>
                     <div class="line">Fall Greeks; fail fame; honour or go or stay;</div>
                     <div class="line">My major vow lies here, this I'll obey.</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, come, Thersites, help to trim my tent:</div>
                     <div class="line">This night in banqueting must all be spent.</div>
                     <div class="line">Away, Patroclus!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt ACHILLES and PATROCLUS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">With too much blood and too little brain, these two</div>
                     <div class="line">may run mad; but, if with too much brain and too</div>
                     <div class="line">little blood they do, I'll be a curer of madmen.</div>
                     <div class="line">Here's Agamemnon, an honest fellow enough and one</div>
                     <div class="line">that loves quails; but he has not so much brain as</div>
                     <div class="line">earwax: and the goodly transformation of Jupiter</div>
                     <div class="line">there, his brother, the bull,--the primitive statue,</div>
                     <div class="line">and oblique memorial of cuckolds; a thrifty</div>
                     <div class="line">shoeing-horn in a chain, hanging at his brother's</div>
                     <div class="line">leg,--to what form but that he is, should wit larded</div>
                     <div class="line">with malice and malice forced with wit turn him to?</div>
                     <div class="line">To an ass, were nothing; he is both ass and ox: to</div>
                     <div class="line">an ox, were nothing; he is both ox and ass. To be a</div>
                     <div class="line">dog, a mule, a cat, a fitchew, a toad, a lizard, an</div>
                     <div class="line">owl, a puttock, or a herring without a roe, I would</div>
                     <div class="line">not care; but to be Menelaus, I would conspire</div>
                     <div class="line">against destiny. Ask me not, what I would be, if I</div>
                     <div class="line">were not Thersites; for I care not to be the louse</div>
                     <div class="line">of a lazar, so I were not Menelaus! Hey-day!</div>
                     <div class="line">spirits and fires!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter HECTOR, TROILUS, AJAX, AGAMEMNON, ULYSSES,
NESTOR, MENELAUS, and DIOMEDES, with lights</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">We go wrong, we go wrong.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">No, yonder 'tis;</div>
                     <div class="line">There, where we see the lights.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">I trouble you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                     <div class="line">No, not a whit.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Here comes himself to guide you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter ACHILLES</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">Welcome, brave Hector; welcome, princes all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">So now, fair prince of Troy, I bid good night.</div>
                     <div class="line">Ajax commands the guard to tend on you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Thanks and good night to the Greeks' general.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MENELAUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Good night, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Good night, sweet lord Menelaus.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Sweet draught: 'sweet' quoth 'a! sweet sink,</div>
                     <div class="line">sweet sewer.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">Good night and welcome, both at once, to those</div>
                     <div class="line">That go or tarry.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                     <div class="line">Good night.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt AGAMEMNON and MENELAUS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">Old Nestor tarries; and you too, Diomed,</div>
                     <div class="line">Keep Hector company an hour or two.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">I cannot, lord; I have important business,</div>
                     <div class="line">The tide whereof is now. Good night, great Hector.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Give me your hand.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to TROILUS</span>  Follow his torch; he goes to</div>
                     <div class="line">Calchas' tent:</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll keep you company.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Sweet sir, you honour me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">And so, good night.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit DIOMEDES; ULYSSES and TROILUS following</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, come, enter my tent.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt ACHILLES, HECTOR, AJAX, and NESTOR</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">That same Diomed's a false-hearted rogue, a most</div>
                     <div class="line">unjust knave; I will no more trust him when he leers</div>
                     <div class="line">than I will a serpent when he hisses: he will spend</div>
                     <div class="line">his mouth, and promise, like Brabbler the hound:</div>
                     <div class="line">but when he performs, astronomers foretell it; it</div>
                     <div class="line">is prodigious, there will come some change; the sun</div>
                     <div class="line">borrows of the moon, when Diomed keeps his</div>
                     <div class="line">word. I will rather leave to see Hector, than</div>
                     <div class="line">not to dog him: they say he keeps a Trojan</div>
                     <div class="line">drab, and uses the traitor Calchas' tent: I'll</div>
                     <div class="line">after. Nothing but lechery! all incontinent varlets!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.8.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter DIOMEDES</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">What, are you up here, ho? speak.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALCHAS</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Within</span>  Who calls?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">Calchas, I think. Where's your daughter?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALCHAS</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Within</span>  She comes to you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter TROILUS and ULYSSES, at a distance;
after them, THERSITES</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Stand where the torch may not discover us.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter CRESSIDA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Cressid comes forth to him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">How now, my charge!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, my sweet guardian! Hark, a word with you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Whispers</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Yea, so familiar!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">She will sing any man at first sight.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">And any man may sing her, if he can take her cliff;</div>
                     <div class="line">she's noted.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">Will you remember?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Remember! yes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, but do, then;</div>
                     <div class="line">And let your mind be coupled with your words.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">What should she remember?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">List.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Sweet honey Greek, tempt me no more to folly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Roguery!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, then,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll tell you what,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">Foh, foh! come, tell a pin: you are forsworn.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">In faith, I cannot: what would you have me do?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">A juggling trick,--to be secretly open.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">What did you swear you would bestow on me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">I prithee, do not hold me to mine oath;</div>
                     <div class="line">Bid me do any thing but that, sweet Greek.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">Good night.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Hold, patience!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">How now, Trojan!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Diomed,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">No, no, good night: I'll be your fool no more.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy better must.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Hark, one word in your ear.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">O plague and madness!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">You are moved, prince; let us depart, I pray you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Lest your displeasure should enlarge itself</div>
                     <div class="line">To wrathful terms: this place is dangerous;</div>
                     <div class="line">The time right deadly; I beseech you, go.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Behold, I pray you!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, good my lord, go off:</div>
                     <div class="line">You flow to great distraction; come, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray thee, stay.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">You have not patience; come.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray you, stay; by hell and all hell's torments</div>
                     <div class="line">I will not speak a word!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">And so, good night.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, but you part in anger.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Doth that grieve thee?</div>
                     <div class="line">O wither'd truth!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, how now, lord!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">By Jove,</div>
                     <div class="line">I will be patient.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Guardian!--why, Greek!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">Foh, foh! adieu; you palter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">In faith, I do not: come hither once again.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">You shake, my lord, at something: will you go?</div>
                     <div class="line">You will break out.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">She strokes his cheek!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, come.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, stay; by Jove, I will not speak a word:</div>
                     <div class="line">There is between my will and all offences</div>
                     <div class="line">A guard of patience: stay a little while.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">How the devil Luxury, with his fat rump and</div>
                     <div class="line">potato-finger, tickles these together! Fry, lechery, fry!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">But will you, then?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">In faith, I will, la; never trust me else.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">Give me some token for the surety of it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll fetch you one.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">You have sworn patience.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Fear me not, sweet lord;</div>
                     <div class="line">I will not be myself, nor have cognition</div>
                     <div class="line">Of what I feel: I am all patience.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter CRESSIDA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Now the pledge; now, now, now!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Here, Diomed, keep this sleeve.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">O beauty! where is thy faith?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I will be patient; outwardly I will.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">You look upon that sleeve; behold it well.</div>
                     <div class="line">He loved me--O false wench!--Give't me again.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose was't?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">It is no matter, now I have't again.</div>
                     <div class="line">I will not meet with you to-morrow night:</div>
                     <div class="line">I prithee, Diomed, visit me no more.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Now she sharpens: well said, whetstone!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">I shall have it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">What, this?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, that.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">O, all you gods! O pretty, pretty pledge!</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy master now lies thinking in his bed</div>
                     <div class="line">Of thee and me, and sighs, and takes my glove,</div>
                     <div class="line">And gives memorial dainty kisses to it,</div>
                     <div class="line">As I kiss thee. Nay, do not snatch it from me;</div>
                     <div class="line">He that takes that doth take my heart withal.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">I had your heart before, this follows it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I did swear patience.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">You shall not have it, Diomed; faith, you shall not;</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll give you something else.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">I will have this: whose was it?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">It is no matter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, tell me whose it was.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twas one's that loved me better than you will.</div>
                     <div class="line">But, now you have it, take it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose was it?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">By all Diana's waiting-women yond,</div>
                     <div class="line">And by herself, I will not tell you whose.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">To-morrow will I wear it on my helm,</div>
                     <div class="line">And grieve his spirit that dares not challenge it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Wert thou the devil, and worest it on thy horn,</div>
                     <div class="line">It should be challenged.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, well, 'tis done, 'tis past: and yet it is not;</div>
                     <div class="line">I will not keep my word.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, then, farewell;</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou never shalt mock Diomed again.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">You shall not go: one cannot speak a word,</div>
                     <div class="line">But it straight starts you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">I do not like this fooling.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor I, by Pluto: but that that likes not you pleases me best.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">What, shall I come? the hour?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, come:--O Jove!--do come:--I shall be plagued.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                     <div class="line">Farewell till then.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Good night: I prithee, come.</div>
                     <p>Exit DIOMEDES</p>
                     <div class="line">Troilus, farewell! one eye yet looks on thee</div>
                     <div class="line">But with my heart the other eye doth see.</div>
                     <div class="line">Ah, poor our sex! this fault in us I find,</div>
                     <div class="line">The error of our eye directs our mind:</div>
                     <div class="line">What error leads must err; O, then conclude</div>
                     <div class="line">Minds sway'd by eyes are full of turpitude.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">A proof of strength she could not publish more,</div>
                     <div class="line">Unless she said ' My mind is now turn'd whore.'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">All's done, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">It is.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Why stay we, then?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">To make a recordation to my soul</div>
                     <div class="line">Of every syllable that here was spoke.</div>
                     <div class="line">But if I tell how these two did co-act,</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall I not lie in publishing a truth?</div>
                     <div class="line">Sith yet there is a credence in my heart,</div>
                     <div class="line">An esperance so obstinately strong,</div>
                     <div class="line">That doth invert the attest of eyes and ears,</div>
                     <div class="line">As if those organs had deceptious functions,</div>
                     <div class="line">Created only to calumniate.</div>
                     <div class="line">Was Cressid here?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">I cannot conjure, Trojan.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">She was not, sure.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Most sure she was.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, my negation hath no taste of madness.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor mine, my lord: Cressid was here but now.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Let it not be believed for womanhood!</div>
                     <div class="line">Think, we had mothers; do not give advantage</div>
                     <div class="line">To stubborn critics, apt, without a theme,</div>
                     <div class="line">For depravation, to square the general sex</div>
                     <div class="line">By Cressid's rule: rather think this not Cressid.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">What hath she done, prince, that can soil our mothers?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Nothing at all, unless that this were she.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Will he swagger himself out on's own eyes?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">This she? no, this is Diomed's Cressida:</div>
                     <div class="line">If beauty have a soul, this is not she;</div>
                     <div class="line">If souls guide vows, if vows be sanctimonies,</div>
                     <div class="line">If sanctimony be the gods' delight,</div>
                     <div class="line">If there be rule in unity itself,</div>
                     <div class="line">This is not she. O madness of discourse,</div>
                     <div class="line">That cause sets up with and against itself!</div>
                     <div class="line">Bi-fold authority! where reason can revolt</div>
                     <div class="line">Without perdition, and loss assume all reason</div>
                     <div class="line">Without revolt: this is, and is not, Cressid.</div>
                     <div class="line">Within my soul there doth conduce a fight</div>
                     <div class="line">Of this strange nature that a thing inseparate</div>
                     <div class="line">Divides more wider than the sky and earth,</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet the spacious breadth of this division</div>
                     <div class="line">Admits no orifex for a point as subtle</div>
                     <div class="line">As Ariachne's broken woof to enter.</div>
                     <div class="line">Instance, O instance! strong as Pluto's gates;</div>
                     <div class="line">Cressid is mine, tied with the bonds of heaven:</div>
                     <div class="line">Instance, O instance! strong as heaven itself;</div>
                     <div class="line">The bonds of heaven are slipp'd, dissolved, and loosed;</div>
                     <div class="line">And with another knot, five-finger-tied,</div>
                     <div class="line">The fractions of her faith, orts of her love,</div>
                     <div class="line">The fragments, scraps, the bits and greasy relics</div>
                     <div class="line">Of her o'er-eaten faith, are bound to Diomed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">May worthy Troilus be half attach'd</div>
                     <div class="line">With that which here his passion doth express?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, Greek; and that shall be divulged well</div>
                     <div class="line">In characters as red as Mars his heart</div>
                     <div class="line">Inflamed with Venus: never did young man fancy</div>
                     <div class="line">With so eternal and so fix'd a soul.</div>
                     <div class="line">Hark, Greek: as much as I do Cressid love,</div>
                     <div class="line">So much by weight hate I her Diomed:</div>
                     <div class="line">That sleeve is mine that he'll bear on his helm;</div>
                     <div class="line">Were it a casque composed by Vulcan's skill,</div>
                     <div class="line">My sword should bite it: not the dreadful spout</div>
                     <div class="line">Which shipmen do the hurricano call,</div>
                     <div class="line">Constringed in mass by the almighty sun,</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall dizzy with more clamour Neptune's ear</div>
                     <div class="line">In his descent than shall my prompted sword</div>
                     <div class="line">Falling on Diomed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">He'll tickle it for his concupy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">O Cressid! O false Cressid! false, false, false!</div>
                     <div class="line">Let all untruths stand by thy stained name,</div>
                     <div class="line">And they'll seem glorious.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">O, contain yourself</div>
                     <div class="line">Your passion draws ears hither.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter AENEAS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                     <div class="line">I have been seeking you this hour, my lord:</div>
                     <div class="line">Hector, by this, is arming him in Troy;</div>
                     <div class="line">Ajax, your guard, stays to conduct you home.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Have with you, prince. My courteous lord, adieu.</div>
                     <div class="line">Farewell, revolted fair! and, Diomed,</div>
                     <div class="line">Stand fast, and wear a castle on thy head!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll bring you to the gates.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Accept distracted thanks.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt TROILUS, AENEAS, and ULYSSES</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                     <div class="line">Would I could meet that rogue Diomed! I would</div>
                     <div class="line">croak like a raven; I would bode, I would bode.</div>
                     <div class="line">Patroclus will give me any thing for the</div>
                     <div class="line">intelligence of this whore: the parrot will not</div>
                     <div class="line">do more for an almond than he for a commodious drab.</div>
                     <div class="line">Lechery, lechery; still, wars and lechery; nothing</div>
                     <div class="line">else holds fashion: a burning devil take them!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.8.4">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>3. SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter HECTOR and ANDROMACHE</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANDROMACHE</div>
                     <div class="line">When was my lord so much ungently temper'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">To stop his ears against admonishment?</div>
                     <div class="line">Unarm, unarm, and do not fight to-day.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">You train me to offend you; get you in:</div>
                     <div class="line">By all the everlasting gods, I'll go!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANDROMACHE</div>
                     <div class="line">My dreams will, sure, prove ominous to the day.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">No more, I say.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter CASSANDRA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                     <div class="line">Where is my brother Hector?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANDROMACHE</div>
                     <div class="line">Here, sister; arm'd, and bloody in intent.</div>
                     <div class="line">Consort with me in loud and dear petition,</div>
                     <div class="line">Pursue we him on knees; for I have dream'd</div>
                     <div class="line">Of bloody turbulence, and this whole night</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath nothing been but shapes and forms of slaughter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                     <div class="line">O, 'tis true.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Ho! bid my trumpet sound!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                     <div class="line">No notes of sally, for the heavens, sweet brother.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Be gone, I say: the gods have heard me swear.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                     <div class="line">The gods are deaf to hot and peevish vows:</div>
                     <div class="line">They are polluted offerings, more abhorr'd</div>
                     <div class="line">Than spotted livers in the sacrifice.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANDROMACHE</div>
                     <div class="line">O, be persuaded! do not count it holy</div>
                     <div class="line">To hurt by being just: it is as lawful,</div>
                     <div class="line">For we would give much, to use violent thefts,</div>
                     <div class="line">And rob in the behalf of charity.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                     <div class="line">It is the purpose that makes strong the vow;</div>
                     <div class="line">But vows to every purpose must not hold:</div>
                     <div class="line">Unarm, sweet Hector.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                     <div class="line">Hold you still, I say;</div>
                     <div class="line">Mine honour keeps the weather of my fate:</div>
                     <div class="line">Lie every man holds dear; but the brave man</div>
                     <div class="line">Holds honour far more precious-dear than life.</div>
