                              <div class="line">Count wisdom as no member of the war,</div>
                              <div class="line">Forestall prescience, and esteem no act</div>
                              <div class="line">But that of hand: the still and mental parts,</div>
                              <div class="line">That do contrive how many hands shall strike,</div>
                              <div class="line">When fitness calls them on, and know by measure</div>
                              <div class="line">Of their observant toil the enemies' weight,--</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, this hath not a finger's dignity:</div>
                              <div class="line">They call this bed-work, mappery, closet-war;</div>
                              <div class="line">So that the ram that batters down the wall,</div>
                              <div class="line">For the great swing and rudeness of his poise,</div>
                              <div class="line">They place before his hand that made the engine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or those that with the fineness of their souls</div>
                              <div class="line">By reason guide his execution.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Let this be granted, and Achilles' horse</div>
                              <div class="line">Makes many Thetis' sons.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>A tucket</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">What trumpet? look, Menelaus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENELAUS</div>
                              <div class="line">From Troy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter AENEAS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">What would you 'fore our tent?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Is this great Agamemnon's tent, I pray you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">Even this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">May one, that is a herald and a prince,</div>
                              <div class="line">Do a fair message to his kingly ears?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">With surety stronger than Achilles' arm</div>
                              <div class="line">'Fore all the Greekish heads, which with one voice</div>
                              <div class="line">Call Agamemnon head and general.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Fair leave and large security. How may</div>
                              <div class="line">A stranger to those most imperial looks</div>
                              <div class="line">Know them from eyes of other mortals?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">How!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay;</div>
                              <div class="line">I ask, that I might waken reverence,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bid the cheek be ready with a blush</div>
                              <div class="line">Modest as morning when she coldly eyes</div>
                              <div class="line">The youthful Phoebus:</div>
                              <div class="line">Which is that god in office, guiding men?</div>
                              <div class="line">Which is the high and mighty Agamemnon?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">This Trojan scorns us; or the men of Troy</div>
                              <div class="line">Are ceremonious courtiers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Courtiers as free, as debonair, unarm'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">As bending angels; that's their fame in peace:</div>
                              <div class="line">But when they would seem soldiers, they have galls,</div>
                              <div class="line">Good arms, strong joints, true swords; and,</div>
                              <div class="line">Jove's accord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing so full of heart. But peace, AEneas,</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace, Trojan; lay thy finger on thy lips!</div>
                              <div class="line">The worthiness of praise distains his worth,</div>
                              <div class="line">If that the praised himself bring the praise forth:</div>
                              <div class="line">But what the repining enemy commends,</div>
                              <div class="line">That breath fame blows; that praise, sole sure,</div>
                              <div class="line">transcends.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, you of Troy, call you yourself AEneas?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, Greek, that is my name.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">What's your affair I pray you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, pardon; 'tis for Agamemnon's ears.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">He hears naught privately that comes from Troy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor I from Troy come not to whisper him:</div>
                              <div class="line">I bring a trumpet to awake his ear,</div>
                              <div class="line">To set his sense on the attentive bent,</div>
                              <div class="line">And then to speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak frankly as the wind;</div>
                              <div class="line">It is not Agamemnon's sleeping hour:</div>
                              <div class="line">That thou shalt know. Trojan, he is awake,</div>
                              <div class="line">He tells thee so himself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Trumpet, blow loud,</div>
                              <div class="line">Send thy brass voice through all these lazy tents;</div>
                              <div class="line">And every Greek of mettle, let him know,</div>
                              <div class="line">What Troy means fairly shall be spoke aloud.</div>
                              <p>Trumpet sounds</p>
                              <div class="line">We have, great Agamemnon, here in Troy</div>
                              <div class="line">A prince call'd Hector,--Priam is his father,--</div>
                              <div class="line">Who in this dull and long-continued truce</div>
                              <div class="line">Is rusty grown: he bade me take a trumpet,</div>
                              <div class="line">And to this purpose speak. Kings, princes, lords!</div>
                              <div class="line">If there be one among the fair'st of Greece</div>
                              <div class="line">That holds his honour higher than his ease,</div>
                              <div class="line">That seeks his praise more than he fears his peril,</div>
                              <div class="line">That knows his valour, and knows not his fear,</div>
                              <div class="line">That loves his mistress more than in confession,</div>
                              <div class="line">With truant vows to her own lips he loves,</div>
                              <div class="line">And dare avow her beauty and her worth</div>
                              <div class="line">In other arms than hers,--to him this challenge.</div>
                              <div class="line">Hector, in view of Trojans and of Greeks,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall make it good, or do his best to do it,</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath a lady, wiser, fairer, truer,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than ever Greek did compass in his arms,</div>
                              <div class="line">And will to-morrow with his trumpet call</div>
                              <div class="line">Midway between your tents and walls of Troy,</div>
                              <div class="line">To rouse a Grecian that is true in love:</div>
                              <div class="line">If any come, Hector shall honour him;</div>
                              <div class="line">If none, he'll say in Troy when he retires,</div>
                              <div class="line">The Grecian dames are sunburnt and not worth</div>
                              <div class="line">The splinter of a lance. Even so much.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">This shall be told our lovers, Lord AEneas;</div>
                              <div class="line">If none of them have soul in such a kind,</div>
                              <div class="line">We left them all at home: but we are soldiers;</div>
                              <div class="line">And may that soldier a mere recreant prove,</div>
                              <div class="line">That means not, hath not, or is not in love!</div>
                              <div class="line">If then one is, or hath, or means to be,</div>
                              <div class="line">That one meets Hector; if none else, I am he.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell him of Nestor, one that was a man</div>
                              <div class="line">When Hector's grandsire suck'd: he is old now;</div>
                              <div class="line">But if there be not in our Grecian host</div>
                              <div class="line">One noble man that hath one spark of fire,</div>
                              <div class="line">To answer for his love, tell him from me</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll hide my silver beard in a gold beaver</div>
                              <div class="line">And in my vantbrace put this wither'd brawn,</div>
                              <div class="line">And meeting him will tell him that my lady</div>
                              <div class="line">Was fairer than his grandam and as chaste</div>
                              <div class="line">As may be in the world: his youth in flood,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll prove this truth with my three drops of blood.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Now heavens forbid such scarcity of youth!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">Amen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">Fair Lord AEneas, let me touch your hand;</div>
                              <div class="line">To our pavilion shall I lead you, sir.</div>
                              <div class="line">Achilles shall have word of this intent;</div>
                              <div class="line">So shall each lord of Greece, from tent to tent:</div>
                              <div class="line">Yourself shall feast with us before you go</div>
                              <div class="line">And find the welcome of a noble foe.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt all but ULYSSES and NESTOR</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">Nestor!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">What says Ulysses?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">I have a young conception in my brain;</div>
                              <div class="line">Be you my time to bring it to some shape.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">What is't?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">This 'tis:</div>
                              <div class="line">Blunt wedges rive hard knots: the seeded pride</div>
                              <div class="line">That hath to this maturity blown up</div>
                              <div class="line">In rank Achilles must or now be cropp'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or, shedding, breed a nursery of like evil,</div>
                              <div class="line">To overbulk us all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, and how?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">This challenge that the gallant Hector sends,</div>
                              <div class="line">However it is spread in general name,</div>
                              <div class="line">Relates in purpose only to Achilles.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">The purpose is perspicuous even as substance,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose grossness little characters sum up:</div>
                              <div class="line">And, in the publication, make no strain,</div>
                              <div class="line">But that Achilles, were his brain as barren</div>
                              <div class="line">As banks of Libya,--though, Apollo knows,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis dry enough,--will, with great speed of judgment,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, with celerity, find Hector's purpose</div>
                              <div class="line">Pointing on him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">And wake him to the answer, think you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, 'tis most meet: whom may you else oppose,</div>
                              <div class="line">That can from Hector bring his honour off,</div>
                              <div class="line">If not Achilles? Though't be a sportful combat,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet in the trial much opinion dwells;</div>
                              <div class="line">For here the Trojans taste our dear'st repute</div>
                              <div class="line">With their finest palate: and trust to me, Ulysses,</div>
                              <div class="line">Our imputation shall be oddly poised</div>
                              <div class="line">In this wild action; for the success,</div>
                              <div class="line">Although particular, shall give a scantling</div>
                              <div class="line">Of good or bad unto the general;</div>
                              <div class="line">And in such indexes, although small pricks</div>
                              <div class="line">To their subsequent volumes, there is seen</div>
                              <div class="line">The baby figure of the giant mass</div>
                              <div class="line">Of things to come at large. It is supposed</div>
                              <div class="line">He that meets Hector issues from our choice</div>
                              <div class="line">And choice, being mutual act of all our souls,</div>
                              <div class="line">Makes merit her election, and doth boil,</div>
                              <div class="line">As 'twere from us all, a man distill'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of our virtues; who miscarrying,</div>
                              <div class="line">What heart receives from hence the conquering part,</div>
                              <div class="line">To steel a strong opinion to themselves?</div>
                              <div class="line">Which entertain'd, limbs are his instruments,</div>
                              <div class="line">In no less working than are swords and bows</div>
                              <div class="line">Directive by the limbs.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">Give pardon to my speech:</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore 'tis meet Achilles meet not Hector.</div>
                              <div class="line">Let us, like merchants, show our foulest wares,</div>
                              <div class="line">And think, perchance, they'll sell; if not,</div>
                              <div class="line">The lustre of the better yet to show,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall show the better. Do not consent</div>
                              <div class="line">That ever Hector and Achilles meet;</div>
                              <div class="line">For both our honour and our shame in this</div>
                              <div class="line">Are dogg'd with two strange followers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">I see them not with my old eyes: what are they?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">What glory our Achilles shares from Hector,</div>
                              <div class="line">Were he not proud, we all should share with him:</div>
                              <div class="line">But he already is too insolent;</div>
                              <div class="line">And we were better parch in Afric sun</div>
                              <div class="line">Than in the pride and salt scorn of his eyes,</div>
                              <div class="line">Should he 'scape Hector fair: if he were foil'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Why then, we did our main opinion crush</div>
                              <div class="line">In taint of our best man. No, make a lottery;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, by device, let blockish Ajax draw</div>
                              <div class="line">The sort to fight with Hector: among ourselves</div>
                              <div class="line">Give him allowance for the better man;</div>
                              <div class="line">For that will physic the great Myrmidon</div>
                              <div class="line">Who broils in loud applause, and make him fall</div>
                              <div class="line">His crest that prouder than blue Iris bends.</div>
                              <div class="line">If the dull brainless Ajax come safe off,</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll dress him up in voices: if he fail,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet go we under our opinion still</div>
                              <div class="line">That we have better men. But, hit or miss,</div>
                              <div class="line">Our project's life this shape of sense assumes:</div>
                              <div class="line">Ajax employ'd plucks down Achilles' plumes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Ulysses,</div>
                              <div class="line">Now I begin to relish thy advice;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I will give a taste of it forthwith</div>
                              <div class="line">To Agamemnon: go we to him straight.</div>
                              <div class="line">Two curs shall tame each other: pride alone</div>
                              <div class="line">Must tarre the mastiffs on, as 'twere their bone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.5">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 2. ACT II</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  A part of the Grecian camp.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  Troy. A room in Priam's palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.4">3. SCENE III.  The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  A part of the Grecian camp.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter AJAX and THERSITES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Thersites!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Agamemnon, how if he had boils? full, all over,</div>
                              <div class="line">generally?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Thersites!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">And those boils did run? say so: did not the</div>
                              <div class="line">general run then? were not that a botchy core?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Dog!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Then would come some matter from him; I see none now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou bitch-wolf's son, canst thou not hear?</div>
                              <p>Beating him</p>
                              <div class="line">Feel, then.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">The plague of Greece upon thee, thou mongrel</div>
                              <div class="line">beef-witted lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak then, thou vinewedst leaven, speak: I will</div>
                              <div class="line">beat thee into handsomeness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall sooner rail thee into wit and holiness: but,</div>
                              <div class="line">I think, thy horse will sooner con an oration than</div>
                              <div class="line">thou learn a prayer without book. Thou canst strike,</div>
                              <div class="line">canst thou? a red murrain o' thy jade's tricks!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Toadstool, learn me the proclamation.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou think I have no sense, thou strikest me thus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">The proclamation!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art proclaimed a fool, I think.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not, porpentine, do not: my fingers itch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">I would thou didst itch from head to foot and I had</div>
                              <div class="line">the scratching of thee; I would make thee the</div>
                              <div class="line">loathsomest scab in Greece. When thou art forth in</div>
                              <div class="line">the incursions, thou strikest as slow as another.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">I say, the proclamation!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou grumblest and railest every hour on Achilles,</div>
                              <div class="line">and thou art as full of envy at his greatness as</div>
                              <div class="line">Cerberus is at Proserpine's beauty, ay, that thou</div>
                              <div class="line">barkest at him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Thersites!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou shouldest strike him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Cobloaf!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">He would pun thee into shivers with his fist, as a</div>
                              <div class="line">sailor breaks a biscuit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Beating him</span>  You whoreson cur!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Do, do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou stool for a witch!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, do, do; thou sodden-witted lord! thou hast no</div>
                              <div class="line">more brain than I have in mine elbows; an assinego</div>
                              <div class="line">may tutor thee: thou scurvy-valiant ass! thou art</div>
                              <div class="line">here but to thrash Trojans; and thou art bought and</div>
                              <div class="line">sold among those of any wit, like a barbarian slave.</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou use to beat me, I will begin at thy heel, and</div>
                              <div class="line">tell what thou art by inches, thou thing of no</div>
                              <div class="line">bowels, thou!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">You dog!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">You scurvy lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Beating him</span>  You cur!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Mars his idiot! do, rudeness; do, camel; do, do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ACHILLES and PATROCLUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, how now, Ajax! wherefore do you thus? How now,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thersites! what's the matter, man?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">You see him there, do you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay; what's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, look upon him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">So I do: what's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, but regard him well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">'Well!' why, I do so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">But yet you look not well upon him; for whosoever you</div>
                              <div class="line">take him to be, he is Ajax.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I know that, fool.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, but that fool knows not himself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore I beat thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Lo, lo, lo, lo, what modicums of wit he utters! his</div>
                              <div class="line">evasions have ears thus long. I have bobbed his</div>
                              <div class="line">brain more than he has beat my bones: I will buy</div>
                              <div class="line">nine sparrows for a penny, and his pia mater is not</div>
                              <div class="line">worth the nineth part of a sparrow. This lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Achilles, Ajax, who wears his wit in his belly and</div>
                              <div class="line">his guts in his head, I'll tell you what I say of</div>
                              <div class="line">him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">What?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">I say, this Ajax--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Ajax offers to beat him</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, good Ajax.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Has not so much wit--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, I must hold you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">As will stop the eye of Helen's needle, for whom he</div>
                              <div class="line">comes to fight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace, fool!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">I would have peace and quietness, but the fool will</div>
                              <div class="line">not: he there: that he: look you there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">O thou damned cur! I shall--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you set your wit to a fool's?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">No, I warrant you; for a fools will shame it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Good words, Thersites.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the quarrel?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">I bade the vile owl go learn me the tenor of the</div>
                              <div class="line">proclamation, and he rails upon me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">I serve thee not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, go to, go to.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">I serve here voluntarily.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Your last service was sufferance, 'twas not</div>
                              <div class="line">voluntary: no man is beaten voluntary: Ajax was</div>
                              <div class="line">here the voluntary, and you as under an impress.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">E'en so; a great deal of your wit, too, lies in your</div>
                              <div class="line">sinews, or else there be liars. Hector have a great</div>
                              <div class="line">catch, if he knock out either of your brains: a'</div>
                              <div class="line">were as good crack a fusty nut with no kernel.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">What, with me too, Thersites?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">There's Ulysses and old Nestor, whose wit was mouldy</div>
                              <div class="line">ere your grandsires had nails on their toes, yoke you</div>
                              <div class="line">like draught-oxen and make you plough up the wars.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">What, what?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, good sooth: to, Achilles! to, Ajax! to!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall cut out your tongue.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis no matter! I shall speak as much as thou</div>
                              <div class="line">afterwards.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No more words, Thersites; peace!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">I will hold my peace when Achilles' brach bids me, shall I?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">There's for you, Patroclus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">I will see you hanged, like clotpoles, ere I come</div>
                              <div class="line">any more to your tents: I will keep where there is</div>
                              <div class="line">wit stirring and leave the faction of fools.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">A good riddance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, this, sir, is proclaim'd through all our host:</div>
                              <div class="line">That Hector, by the fifth hour of the sun,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will with a trumpet 'twixt our tents and Troy</div>
                              <div class="line">To-morrow morning call some knight to arms</div>
                              <div class="line">That hath a stomach; and such a one that dare</div>
                              <div class="line">Maintain--I know not what: 'tis trash. Farewell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell. Who shall answer him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not: 'tis put to lottery; otherwise</div>
                              <div class="line">He knew his man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">O, meaning you. I will go learn more of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  Troy. A room in Priam's palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter PRIAM, HECTOR, TROILUS, PARIS, and HELENUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRIAM</div>
                              <div class="line">After so many hours, lives, speeches spent,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus once again says Nestor from the Greeks:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Deliver Helen, and all damage else--</div>
                              <div class="line">As honour, loss of time, travail, expense,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wounds, friends, and what else dear that is consumed</div>
                              <div class="line">In hot digestion of this cormorant war--</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall be struck off.' Hector, what say you to't?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Though no man lesser fears the Greeks than I</div>
                              <div class="line">As far as toucheth my particular,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet, dread Priam,</div>
                              <div class="line">There is no lady of more softer bowels,</div>
                              <div class="line">More spongy to suck in the sense of fear,</div>
                              <div class="line">More ready to cry out 'Who knows what follows?'</div>
                              <div class="line">Than Hector is: the wound of peace is surety,</div>
                              <div class="line">Surety secure; but modest doubt is call'd</div>
                              <div class="line">The beacon of the wise, the tent that searches</div>
                              <div class="line">To the bottom of the worst. Let Helen go:</div>
                              <div class="line">Since the first sword was drawn about this question,</div>
                              <div class="line">Every tithe soul, 'mongst many thousand dismes,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath been as dear as Helen; I mean, of ours:</div>
                              <div class="line">If we have lost so many tenths of ours,</div>
                              <div class="line">To guard a thing not ours nor worth to us,</div>
                              <div class="line">Had it our name, the value of one ten,</div>
                              <div class="line">What merit's in that reason which denies</div>
                              <div class="line">The yielding of her up?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, fie, my brother!</div>
                              <div class="line">Weigh you the worth and honour of a king</div>
                              <div class="line">So great as our dread father in a scale</div>
                              <div class="line">Of common ounces? will you with counters sum</div>
                              <div class="line">The past proportion of his infinite?</div>
                              <div class="line">And buckle in a waist most fathomless</div>
                              <div class="line">With spans and inches so diminutive</div>
                              <div class="line">As fears and reasons? fie, for godly shame!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No marvel, though you bite so sharp at reasons,</div>
                              <div class="line">You are so empty of them. Should not our father</div>
                              <div class="line">Bear the great sway of his affairs with reasons,</div>
                              <div class="line">Because your speech hath none that tells him so?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You are for dreams and slumbers, brother priest;</div>
                              <div class="line">You fur your gloves with reason. Here are</div>
                              <div class="line">your reasons:</div>
                              <div class="line">You know an enemy intends you harm;</div>
                              <div class="line">You know a sword employ'd is perilous,</div>
                              <div class="line">And reason flies the object of all harm:</div>
                              <div class="line">Who marvels then, when Helenus beholds</div>
                              <div class="line">A Grecian and his sword, if he do set</div>
                              <div class="line">The very wings of reason to his heels</div>
                              <div class="line">And fly like chidden Mercury from Jove,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or like a star disorb'd? Nay, if we talk of reason,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's shut our gates and sleep: manhood and honour</div>
                              <div class="line">Should have hare-hearts, would they but fat</div>
                              <div class="line">their thoughts</div>
                              <div class="line">With this cramm'd reason: reason and respect</div>
                              <div class="line">Make livers pale and lustihood deject.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Brother, she is not worth what she doth cost</div>
                              <div class="line">The holding.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What is aught, but as 'tis valued?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">But value dwells not in particular will;</div>
                              <div class="line">It holds his estimate and dignity</div>
                              <div class="line">As well wherein 'tis precious of itself</div>
                              <div class="line">As in the prizer: 'tis mad idolatry</div>
                              <div class="line">To make the service greater than the god</div>
                              <div class="line">And the will dotes that is attributive</div>
                              <div class="line">To what infectiously itself affects,</div>
                              <div class="line">Without some image of the affected merit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I take to-day a wife, and my election</div>
                              <div class="line">Is led on in the conduct of my will;</div>
                              <div class="line">My will enkindled by mine eyes and ears,</div>
                              <div class="line">Two traded pilots 'twixt the dangerous shores</div>
                              <div class="line">Of will and judgment: how may I avoid,</div>
                              <div class="line">Although my will distaste what it elected,</div>
                              <div class="line">The wife I chose? there can be no evasion</div>
                              <div class="line">To blench from this and to stand firm by honour:</div>
                              <div class="line">We turn not back the silks upon the merchant,</div>
                              <div class="line">When we have soil'd them, nor the remainder viands</div>
                              <div class="line">We do not throw in unrespective sieve,</div>
                              <div class="line">Because we now are full. It was thought meet</div>
                              <div class="line">Paris should do some vengeance on the Greeks:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your breath of full consent bellied his sails;</div>
                              <div class="line">The seas and winds, old wranglers, took a truce</div>
                              <div class="line">And did him service: he touch'd the ports desired,</div>
                              <div class="line">And for an old aunt whom the Greeks held captive,</div>
                              <div class="line">He brought a Grecian queen, whose youth and freshness</div>
                              <div class="line">Wrinkles Apollo's, and makes stale the morning.</div>
                              <div class="line">Why keep we her? the Grecians keep our aunt:</div>
                              <div class="line">Is she worth keeping? why, she is a pearl,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose price hath launch'd above a thousand ships,</div>
                              <div class="line">And turn'd crown'd kings to merchants.</div>
                              <div class="line">If you'll avouch 'twas wisdom Paris went--</div>
                              <div class="line">As you must needs, for you all cried 'Go, go,'--</div>
                              <div class="line">If you'll confess he brought home noble prize--</div>
                              <div class="line">As you must needs, for you all clapp'd your hands</div>
                              <div class="line">And cried 'Inestimable!'--why do you now</div>
                              <div class="line">The issue of your proper wisdoms rate,</div>
                              <div class="line">And do a deed that fortune never did,</div>
                              <div class="line">Beggar the estimation which you prized</div>
                              <div class="line">Richer than sea and land? O, theft most base,</div>
                              <div class="line">That we have stol'n what we do fear to keep!</div>
                              <div class="line">But, thieves, unworthy of a thing so stol'n,</div>
                              <div class="line">That in their country did them that disgrace,</div>
                              <div class="line">We fear to warrant in our native place!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Cry, Trojans, cry!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRIAM</div>
                              <div class="line">What noise? what shriek is this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis our mad sister, I do know her voice.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Cry, Trojans!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">It is Cassandra.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter CASSANDRA, raving</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                              <div class="line">Cry, Trojans, cry! lend me ten thousand eyes,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I will fill them with prophetic tears.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace, sister, peace!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                              <div class="line">Virgins and boys, mid-age and wrinkled eld,</div>
                              <div class="line">Soft infancy, that nothing canst but cry,</div>
                              <div class="line">Add to my clamours! let us pay betimes</div>
                              <div class="line">A moiety of that mass of moan to come.</div>
                              <div class="line">Cry, Trojans, cry! practise your eyes with tears!</div>
                              <div class="line">Troy must not be, nor goodly Ilion stand;</div>
                              <div class="line">Our firebrand brother, Paris, burns us all.</div>
                              <div class="line">Cry, Trojans, cry! a Helen and a woe:</div>
                              <div class="line">Cry, cry! Troy burns, or else let Helen go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, youthful Troilus, do not these high strains</div>
                              <div class="line">Of divination in our sister work</div>
                              <div class="line">Some touches of remorse? or is your blood</div>
                              <div class="line">So madly hot that no discourse of reason,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor fear of bad success in a bad cause,</div>
                              <div class="line">Can qualify the same?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, brother Hector,</div>
                              <div class="line">We may not think the justness of each act</div>
                              <div class="line">Such and no other than event doth form it,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor once deject the courage of our minds,</div>
                              <div class="line">Because Cassandra's mad: her brain-sick raptures</div>
                              <div class="line">Cannot distaste the goodness of a quarrel</div>
                              <div class="line">Which hath our several honours all engaged</div>
                              <div class="line">To make it gracious. For my private part,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am no more touch'd than all Priam's sons:</div>
                              <div class="line">And Jove forbid there should be done amongst us</div>
                              <div class="line">Such things as might offend the weakest spleen</div>
                              <div class="line">To fight for and maintain!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Else might the world convince of levity</div>
                              <div class="line">As well my undertakings as your counsels:</div>
                              <div class="line">But I attest the gods, your full consent</div>
                              <div class="line">Gave wings to my propension and cut off</div>
                              <div class="line">All fears attending on so dire a project.</div>
                              <div class="line">For what, alas, can these my single arms?</div>
                              <div class="line">What Propugnation is in one man's valour,</div>
                              <div class="line">To stand the push and enmity of those</div>
                              <div class="line">This quarrel would excite? Yet, I protest,</div>
                              <div class="line">Were I alone to pass the difficulties</div>
                              <div class="line">And had as ample power as I have will,</div>
                              <div class="line">Paris should ne'er retract what he hath done,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor faint in the pursuit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRIAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Paris, you speak</div>
                              <div class="line">Like one besotted on your sweet delights:</div>
                              <div class="line">You have the honey still, but these the gall;</div>
                              <div class="line">So to be valiant is no praise at all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I propose not merely to myself</div>
                              <div class="line">The pleasures such a beauty brings with it;</div>
                              <div class="line">But I would have the soil of her fair rape</div>
                              <div class="line">Wiped off, in honourable keeping her.</div>
                              <div class="line">What treason were it to the ransack'd queen,</div>
                              <div class="line">Disgrace to your great worths and shame to me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Now to deliver her possession up</div>
                              <div class="line">On terms of base compulsion! Can it be</div>
                              <div class="line">That so degenerate a strain as this</div>
                              <div class="line">Should once set footing in your generous bosoms?</div>
                              <div class="line">There's not the meanest spirit on our party</div>
                              <div class="line">Without a heart to dare or sword to draw</div>
