                              <div class="line">Patroclus make demands to me, you shall see the</div>
                              <div class="line">pageant of Ajax.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">To him, Patroclus; tell him I humbly desire the</div>
                              <div class="line">valiant Ajax to invite the most valorous Hector</div>
                              <div class="line">to come unarmed to my tent, and to procure</div>
                              <div class="line">safe-conduct for his person of the magnanimous</div>
                              <div class="line">and most illustrious six-or-seven-times-honoured</div>
                              <div class="line">captain-general of the Grecian army, Agamemnon,</div>
                              <div class="line">et cetera. Do this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Jove bless great Ajax!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Hum!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I come from the worthy Achilles,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Who most humbly desires you to invite Hector to his tent,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Hum!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">And to procure safe-conduct from Agamemnon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Agamemnon!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What say you to't?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">God b' wi' you, with all my heart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Your answer, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">If to-morrow be a fair day, by eleven o'clock it will</div>
                              <div class="line">go one way or other: howsoever, he shall pay for me</div>
                              <div class="line">ere he has me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Your answer, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Fare you well, with all my heart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, but he is not in this tune, is he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">No, but he's out o' tune thus. What music will be in</div>
                              <div class="line">him when Hector has knocked out his brains, I know</div>
                              <div class="line">not; but, I am sure, none, unless the fiddler Apollo</div>
                              <div class="line">get his sinews to make catlings on.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, thou shalt bear a letter to him straight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me bear another to his horse; for that's the more</div>
                              <div class="line">capable creature.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">My mind is troubled, like a fountain stirr'd;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I myself see not the bottom of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt ACHILLES and PATROCLUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Would the fountain of your mind were clear again,</div>
                              <div class="line">that I might water an ass at it! I had rather be a</div>
                              <div class="line">tick in a sheep than such a valiant ignorance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.7">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 4. ACT IV</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.2">1. SCENE I.  Troy. A street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.3">2. SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.4">3. SCENE III.  The same. Street before Pandarus' house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.5">4. SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.6">5. SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Troy. A street.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter, from one side, AENEAS, and Servant with a
torch; from the other, PARIS, DEIPHOBUS, ANTENOR,
DIOMEDES, and others, with torches</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                              <div class="line">See, ho! who is that there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DEIPHOBUS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is the Lord AEneas.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Is the prince there in person?</div>
                              <div class="line">Had I so good occasion to lie long</div>
                              <div class="line">As you, prince Paris, nothing but heavenly business</div>
                              <div class="line">Should rob my bed-mate of my company.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">That's my mind too. Good morrow, Lord AEneas.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                              <div class="line">A valiant Greek, AEneas,--take his hand,--</div>
                              <div class="line">Witness the process of your speech, wherein</div>
                              <div class="line">You told how Diomed, a whole week by days,</div>
                              <div class="line">Did haunt you in the field.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Health to you, valiant sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">During all question of the gentle truce;</div>
                              <div class="line">But when I meet you arm'd, as black defiance</div>
                              <div class="line">As heart can think or courage execute.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">The one and other Diomed embraces.</div>
                              <div class="line">Our bloods are now in calm; and, so long, health!</div>
                              <div class="line">But when contention and occasion meet,</div>
                              <div class="line">By Jove, I'll play the hunter for thy life</div>
                              <div class="line">With all my force, pursuit and policy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">And thou shalt hunt a lion, that will fly</div>
                              <div class="line">With his face backward. In humane gentleness,</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome to Troy! now, by Anchises' life,</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome, indeed! By Venus' hand I swear,</div>
                              <div class="line">No man alive can love in such a sort</div>
                              <div class="line">The thing he means to kill more excellently.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">We sympathize: Jove, let AEneas live,</div>
                              <div class="line">If to my sword his fate be not the glory,</div>
                              <div class="line">A thousand complete courses of the sun!</div>
                              <div class="line">But, in mine emulous honour, let him die,</div>
                              <div class="line">With every joint a wound, and that to-morrow!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">We know each other well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">We do; and long to know each other worse.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                              <div class="line">This is the most despiteful gentle greeting,</div>
                              <div class="line">The noblest hateful love, that e'er I heard of.</div>
                              <div class="line">What business, lord, so early?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">I was sent for to the king; but why, I know not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                              <div class="line">His purpose meets you: 'twas to bring this Greek</div>
                              <div class="line">To Calchas' house, and there to render him,</div>
                              <div class="line">For the enfreed Antenor, the fair Cressid:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's have your company, or, if you please,</div>
                              <div class="line">Haste there before us: I constantly do think--</div>
                              <div class="line">Or rather, call my thought a certain knowledge--</div>
                              <div class="line">My brother Troilus lodges there to-night:</div>
                              <div class="line">Rouse him and give him note of our approach.</div>
                              <div class="line">With the whole quality wherefore: I fear</div>
                              <div class="line">We shall be much unwelcome.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">That I assure you:</div>
                              <div class="line">Troilus had rather Troy were borne to Greece</div>
                              <div class="line">Than Cressid borne from Troy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                              <div class="line">There is no help;</div>
                              <div class="line">The bitter disposition of the time</div>
                              <div class="line">Will have it so. On, lord; we'll follow you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow, all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit with Servant</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                              <div class="line">And tell me, noble Diomed, faith, tell me true,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even in the soul of sound good-fellowship,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, in your thoughts, merits fair Helen best,</div>
                              <div class="line">Myself or Menelaus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Both alike:</div>
                              <div class="line">He merits well to have her, that doth seek her,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not making any scruple of her soilure,</div>
                              <div class="line">With such a hell of pain and world of charge,</div>
                              <div class="line">And you as well to keep her, that defend her,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not palating the taste of her dishonour,</div>
                              <div class="line">With such a costly loss of wealth and friends:</div>
                              <div class="line">He, like a puling cuckold, would drink up</div>
                              <div class="line">The lees and dregs of a flat tamed piece;</div>
                              <div class="line">You, like a lecher, out of whorish loins</div>
                              <div class="line">Are pleased to breed out your inheritors:</div>
                              <div class="line">Both merits poised, each weighs nor less nor more;</div>
                              <div class="line">But he as he, the heavier for a whore.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                              <div class="line">You are too bitter to your countrywoman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">She's bitter to her country: hear me, Paris:</div>
                              <div class="line">For every false drop in her bawdy veins</div>
                              <div class="line">A Grecian's life hath sunk; for every scruple</div>
                              <div class="line">Of her contaminated carrion weight,</div>
                              <div class="line">A Trojan hath been slain: since she could speak,</div>
                              <div class="line">She hath not given so many good words breath</div>
                              <div class="line">As for her Greeks and Trojans suffer'd death.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Fair Diomed, you do as chapmen do,</div>
                              <div class="line">Dispraise the thing that you desire to buy:</div>
                              <div class="line">But we in silence hold this virtue well,</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll but commend what we intend to sell.</div>
                              <div class="line">Here lies our way.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter TROILUS and CRESSIDA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Dear, trouble not yourself: the morn is cold.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, sweet my lord, I'll call mine uncle down;</div>
                              <div class="line">He shall unbolt the gates.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Trouble him not;</div>
                              <div class="line">To bed, to bed: sleep kill those pretty eyes,</div>
                              <div class="line">And give as soft attachment to thy senses</div>
                              <div class="line">As infants' empty of all thought!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow, then.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee now, to bed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you a-weary of me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O Cressida! but that the busy day,</div>
                              <div class="line">Waked by the lark, hath roused the ribald crows,</div>
                              <div class="line">And dreaming night will hide our joys no longer,</div>
                              <div class="line">I would not from thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Night hath been too brief.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Beshrew the witch! with venomous wights she stays</div>
                              <div class="line">As tediously as hell, but flies the grasps of love</div>
                              <div class="line">With wings more momentary-swift than thought.</div>
                              <div class="line">You will catch cold, and curse me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, tarry:</div>
                              <div class="line">You men will never tarry.</div>
                              <div class="line">O foolish Cressid! I might have still held off,</div>
                              <div class="line">And then you would have tarried. Hark!</div>
                              <div class="line">there's one up.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  What, 's all the doors open here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is your uncle.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">A pestilence on him! now will he be mocking:</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall have such a life!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter PANDARUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, how now! how go maidenheads? Here, you</div>
                              <div class="line">maid! where's my cousin Cressid?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Go hang yourself, you naughty mocking uncle!</div>
                              <div class="line">You bring me to do, and then you flout me too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">To do what? to do what? let her say</div>
                              <div class="line">what: what have I brought you to do?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, beshrew your heart! you'll ne'er be good,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor suffer others.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha! ha! Alas, poor wretch! ah, poor capocchia!</div>
                              <div class="line">hast not slept to-night? would he not, a naughty</div>
                              <div class="line">man, let it sleep? a bugbear take him!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Did not I tell you? Would he were knock'd i' the head!</div>
                              <p>Knocking within</p>
                              <div class="line">Who's that at door? good uncle, go and see.</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, come you again into my chamber:</div>
                              <div class="line">You smile and mock me, as if I meant naughtily.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha, ha!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, you are deceived, I think of no such thing.</div>
                              <p>Knocking within</p>
                              <div class="line">How earnestly they knock! Pray you, come in:</div>
                              <div class="line">I would not for half Troy have you seen here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt TROILUS and CRESSIDA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Who's there? what's the matter? will you beat</div>
                              <div class="line">down the door? How now! what's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter AENEAS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow, lord, good morrow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Who's there? my Lord AEneas! By my troth,</div>
                              <div class="line">I knew you not: what news with you so early?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Is not Prince Troilus here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Here! what should he do here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, he is here, my lord; do not deny him:</div>
                              <div class="line">It doth import him much to speak with me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Is he here, say you? 'tis more than I know, I'll</div>
                              <div class="line">be sworn: for my own part, I came in late. What</div>
                              <div class="line">should he do here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Who!--nay, then: come, come, you'll do him wrong</div>
                              <div class="line">ere you're ware: you'll be so true to him, to be</div>
                              <div class="line">false to him: do not you know of him, but yet go</div>
                              <div class="line">fetch him hither; go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter TROILUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How now! what's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I scarce have leisure to salute you,</div>
                              <div class="line">My matter is so rash: there is at hand</div>
                              <div class="line">Paris your brother, and Deiphobus,</div>
                              <div class="line">The Grecian Diomed, and our Antenor</div>
                              <div class="line">Deliver'd to us; and for him forthwith,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere the first sacrifice, within this hour,</div>
                              <div class="line">We must give up to Diomedes' hand</div>
                              <div class="line">The Lady Cressida.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it so concluded?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">By Priam and the general state of Troy:</div>
                              <div class="line">They are at hand and ready to effect it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How my achievements mock me!</div>
                              <div class="line">I will go meet them: and, my Lord AEneas,</div>
                              <div class="line">We met by chance; you did not find me here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Good, good, my lord; the secrets of nature</div>
                              <div class="line">Have not more gift in taciturnity.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt TROILUS and AENEAS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't possible? no sooner got but lost? The devil</div>
                              <div class="line">take Antenor! the young prince will go mad: a</div>
                              <div class="line">plague upon Antenor! I would they had broke 's neck!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter CRESSIDA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">How now! what's the matter? who was here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, ah!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why sigh you so profoundly? where's my lord? gone!</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell me, sweet uncle, what's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Would I were as deep under the earth as I am above!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">O the gods! what's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, get thee in: would thou hadst ne'er been</div>
                              <div class="line">born! I knew thou wouldst be his death. O, poor</div>
                              <div class="line">gentleman! A plague upon Antenor!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Good uncle, I beseech you, on my knees! beseech you,</div>
                              <div class="line">what's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou must be gone, wench, thou must be gone; thou</div>
                              <div class="line">art changed for Antenor: thou must to thy father,</div>
                              <div class="line">and be gone from Troilus: 'twill be his death;</div>
                              <div class="line">'twill be his bane; he cannot bear it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">O you immortal gods! I will not go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou must.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not, uncle: I have forgot my father;</div>
                              <div class="line">I know no touch of consanguinity;</div>
                              <div class="line">No kin no love, no blood, no soul so near me</div>
                              <div class="line">As the sweet Troilus. O you gods divine!</div>
                              <div class="line">Make Cressid's name the very crown of falsehood,</div>
                              <div class="line">If ever she leave Troilus! Time, force, and death,</div>
                              <div class="line">Do to this body what extremes you can;</div>
                              <div class="line">But the strong base and building of my love</div>
                              <div class="line">Is as the very centre of the earth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Drawing all things to it. I'll go in and weep,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Do, do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Tear my bright hair and scratch my praised cheeks,</div>
                              <div class="line">Crack my clear voice with sobs and break my heart</div>
                              <div class="line">With sounding Troilus. I will not go from Troy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  The same. Street before Pandarus' house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter PARIS, TROILUS, AENEAS, DEIPHOBUS, ANTENOR,
and DIOMEDES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is great morning, and the hour prefix'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Of her delivery to this valiant Greek</div>
                              <div class="line">Comes fast upon. Good my brother Troilus,</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell you the lady what she is to do,</div>
                              <div class="line">And haste her to the purpose.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Walk into her house;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll bring her to the Grecian presently:</div>
                              <div class="line">And to his hand when I deliver her,</div>
                              <div class="line">Think it an altar, and thy brother Troilus</div>
                              <div class="line">A priest there offering to it his own heart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                              <div class="line">I know what 'tis to love;</div>
                              <div class="line">And would, as I shall pity, I could help!</div>
                              <div class="line">Please you walk in, my lords.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter PANDARUS and CRESSIDA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Be moderate, be moderate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why tell you me of moderation?</div>
                              <div class="line">The grief is fine, full, perfect, that I taste,</div>
                              <div class="line">And violenteth in a sense as strong</div>
                              <div class="line">As that which causeth it: how can I moderate it?</div>
                              <div class="line">If I could temporize with my affection,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or brew it to a weak and colder palate,</div>
                              <div class="line">The like allayment could I give my grief.</div>
                              <div class="line">My love admits no qualifying dross;</div>
                              <div class="line">No more my grief, in such a precious loss.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, here, here he comes.</div>
                              <p>Enter TROILUS</p>
                              <div class="line">Ah, sweet ducks!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">O Troilus! Troilus!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Embracing him</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What a pair of spectacles is here!</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me embrace too. 'O heart,' as the goodly saying is,</div>
                              <div class="line">'--O heart, heavy heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">Why sigh'st thou without breaking?</div>
                              <div class="line">where he answers again,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Because thou canst not ease thy smart</div>
                              <div class="line">By friendship nor by speaking.'</div>
                              <div class="line">There was never a truer rhyme. Let us cast away</div>
                              <div class="line">nothing, for we may live to have need of such a</div>
                              <div class="line">verse: we see it, we see it. How now, lambs?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Cressid, I love thee in so strain'd a purity,</div>
                              <div class="line">That the bless'd gods, as angry with my fancy,</div>
                              <div class="line">More bright in zeal than the devotion which</div>
                              <div class="line">Cold lips blow to their deities, take thee from me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Have the gods envy?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, ay, ay, ay; 'tis too plain a case.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">And is it true that I must go from Troy?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">A hateful truth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">What, and from Troilus too?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">From Troy and Troilus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it possible?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">And suddenly; where injury of chance</div>
                              <div class="line">Puts back leave-taking, justles roughly by</div>
                              <div class="line">All time of pause, rudely beguiles our lips</div>
                              <div class="line">Of all rejoindure, forcibly prevents</div>
                              <div class="line">Our lock'd embrasures, strangles our dear vows</div>
                              <div class="line">Even in the birth of our own labouring breath:</div>
                              <div class="line">We two, that with so many thousand sighs</div>
                              <div class="line">Did buy each other, must poorly sell ourselves</div>
                              <div class="line">With the rude brevity and discharge of one.</div>
                              <div class="line">Injurious time now with a robber's haste</div>
                              <div class="line">Crams his rich thievery up, he knows not how:</div>
                              <div class="line">As many farewells as be stars in heaven,</div>
                              <div class="line">With distinct breath and consign'd kisses to them,</div>
                              <div class="line">He fumbles up into a lose adieu,</div>
                              <div class="line">And scants us with a single famish'd kiss,</div>
                              <div class="line">Distasted with the salt of broken tears.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  My lord, is the lady ready?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hark! you are call'd: some say the Genius so</div>
                              <div class="line">Cries 'come' to him that instantly must die.</div>
                              <div class="line">Bid them have patience; she shall come anon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Where are my tears? rain, to lay this wind, or</div>
                              <div class="line">my heart will be blown up by the root.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">I must then to the Grecians?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No remedy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">A woful Cressid 'mongst the merry Greeks!</div>
                              <div class="line">When shall we see again?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear me, my love: be thou but true of heart,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">I true! how now! what wicked deem is this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, we must use expostulation kindly,</div>
                              <div class="line">For it is parting from us:</div>
                              <div class="line">I speak not 'be thou true,' as fearing thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">For I will throw my glove to Death himself,</div>
                              <div class="line">That there's no maculation in thy heart:</div>
                              <div class="line">But 'be thou true,' say I, to fashion in</div>
                              <div class="line">My sequent protestation; be thou true,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I will see thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, you shall be exposed, my lord, to dangers</div>
                              <div class="line">As infinite as imminent! but I'll be true.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">And I'll grow friend with danger. Wear this sleeve.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">And you this glove. When shall I see you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I will corrupt the Grecian sentinels,</div>
                              <div class="line">To give thee nightly visitation.</div>
                              <div class="line">But yet be true.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">O heavens! 'be true' again!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear while I speak it, love:</div>
                              <div class="line">The Grecian youths are full of quality;</div>
                              <div class="line">They're loving, well composed with gifts of nature,</div>
                              <div class="line">Flowing and swelling o'er with arts and exercise:</div>
                              <div class="line">How novelty may move, and parts with person,</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, a kind of godly jealousy--</div>
                              <div class="line">Which, I beseech you, call a virtuous sin--</div>
                              <div class="line">Makes me afeard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">O heavens! you love me not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Die I a villain, then!</div>
                              <div class="line">In this I do not call your faith in question</div>
                              <div class="line">So mainly as my merit: I cannot sing,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor heel the high lavolt, nor sweeten talk,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor play at subtle games; fair virtues all,</div>
                              <div class="line">To which the Grecians are most prompt and pregnant:</div>
                              <div class="line">But I can tell that in each grace of these</div>
                              <div class="line">There lurks a still and dumb-discoursive devil</div>
                              <div class="line">That tempts most cunningly: but be not tempted.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you think I will?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No.</div>
                              <div class="line">But something may be done that we will not:</div>
                              <div class="line">And sometimes we are devils to ourselves,</div>
                              <div class="line">When we will tempt the frailty of our powers,</div>
                              <div class="line">Presuming on their changeful potency.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Nay, good my lord,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, kiss; and let us part.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Brother Troilus!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Good brother, come you hither;</div>
                              <div class="line">And bring AEneas and the Grecian with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, will you be true?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, I? alas, it is my vice, my fault:</div>
                              <div class="line">Whiles others fish with craft for great opinion,</div>
                              <div class="line">I with great truth catch mere simplicity;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whilst some with cunning gild their copper crowns,</div>
                              <div class="line">With truth and plainness I do wear mine bare.</div>
                              <div class="line">Fear not my truth: the moral of my wit</div>
                              <div class="line">Is 'plain and true;' there's all the reach of it.</div>
                              <p>Enter AENEAS, PARIS, ANTENOR, DEIPHOBUS,
and DIOMEDES</p>
                              <div class="line">Welcome, Sir Diomed! here is the lady</div>
                              <div class="line">Which for Antenor we deliver you:</div>
                              <div class="line">At the port, lord, I'll give her to thy hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">And by the way possess thee what she is.</div>
                              <div class="line">Entreat her fair; and, by my soul, fair Greek,</div>
                              <div class="line">If e'er thou stand at mercy of my sword,</div>
                              <div class="line">Name Cressida and thy life shall be as safe</div>
                              <div class="line">As Priam is in Ilion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Fair Lady Cressid,</div>
                              <div class="line">So please you, save the thanks this prince expects:</div>
                              <div class="line">The lustre in your eye, heaven in your cheek,</div>
                              <div class="line">Pleads your fair usage; and to Diomed</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall be mistress, and command him wholly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Grecian, thou dost not use me courteously,</div>
                              <div class="line">To shame the zeal of my petition to thee</div>
                              <div class="line">In praising her: I tell thee, lord of Greece,</div>
                              <div class="line">She is as far high-soaring o'er thy praises</div>
                              <div class="line">As thou unworthy to be call'd her servant.</div>
                              <div class="line">I charge thee use her well, even for my charge;</div>
                              <div class="line">For, by the dreadful Pluto, if thou dost not,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though the great bulk Achilles be thy guard,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll cut thy throat.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">O, be not moved, Prince Troilus:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me be privileged by my place and message,</div>
                              <div class="line">To be a speaker free; when I am hence</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll answer to my lust: and know you, lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll nothing do on charge: to her own worth</div>
                              <div class="line">She shall be prized; but that you say 'be't so,'</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll speak it in my spirit and honour, 'no.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, to the port. I'll tell thee, Diomed,</div>
                              <div class="line">This brave shall oft make thee to hide thy head.</div>
                              <div class="line">Lady, give me your hand, and, as we walk,</div>
                              <div class="line">To our own selves bend we our needful talk.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt TROILUS, CRESSIDA, and DIOMEDES</p>
                        <p>Trumpet within</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hark! Hector's trumpet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">How have we spent this morning!</div>
                              <div class="line">The prince must think me tardy and remiss,</div>
                              <div class="line">That sore to ride before him to the field.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PARIS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis Troilus' fault: come, come, to field with him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DEIPHOBUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Let us make ready straight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, with a bridegroom's fresh alacrity,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let us address to tend on Hector's heels:</div>
                              <div class="line">The glory of our Troy doth this day lie</div>
                              <div class="line">On his fair worth and single chivalry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter AJAX, armed; AGAMEMNON, ACHILLES, PATROCLUS,
MENELAUS, ULYSSES, NESTOR, and others</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">Here art thou in appointment fresh and fair,</div>
                              <div class="line">Anticipating time with starting courage.</div>
                              <div class="line">Give with thy trumpet a loud note to Troy,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou dreadful Ajax; that the appalled air</div>
                              <div class="line">May pierce the head of the great combatant</div>
                              <div class="line">And hale him hither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou, trumpet, there's my purse.</div>
                              <div class="line">Now crack thy lungs, and split thy brazen pipe:</div>
                              <div class="line">Blow, villain, till thy sphered bias cheek</div>
                              <div class="line">Outswell the colic of puff'd Aquilon:</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, stretch thy chest and let thy eyes spout blood;</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou blow'st for Hector.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Trumpet sounds</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">No trumpet answers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis but early days.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">Is not yond Diomed, with Calchas' daughter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis he, I ken the manner of his gait;</div>
                              <div class="line">He rises on the toe: that spirit of his</div>
                              <div class="line">In aspiration lifts him from the earth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter DIOMEDES, with CRESSIDA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">Is this the Lady Cressid?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Even she.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
