                              <div class="line">Most dearly welcome to the Greeks, sweet lady.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Our general doth salute you with a kiss.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet is the kindness but particular;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twere better she were kiss'd in general.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">And very courtly counsel: I'll begin.</div>
                              <div class="line">So much for Nestor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll take what winter from your lips, fair lady:</div>
                              <div class="line">Achilles bids you welcome.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENELAUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I had good argument for kissing once.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">But that's no argument for kissing now;</div>
                              <div class="line">For this popp'd Paris in his hardiment,</div>
                              <div class="line">And parted thus you and your argument.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">O deadly gall, and theme of all our scorns!</div>
                              <div class="line">For which we lose our heads to gild his horns.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">The first was Menelaus' kiss; this, mine:</div>
                              <div class="line">Patroclus kisses you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENELAUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O, this is trim!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Paris and I kiss evermore for him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENELAUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll have my kiss, sir. Lady, by your leave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">In kissing, do you render or receive?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Both take and give.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll make my match to live,</div>
                              <div class="line">The kiss you take is better than you give;</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore no kiss.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENELAUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll give you boot, I'll give you three for one.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">You're an odd man; give even or give none.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENELAUS</div>
                              <div class="line">An odd man, lady! every man is odd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, Paris is not; for you know 'tis true,</div>
                              <div class="line">That you are odd, and he is even with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENELAUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You fillip me o' the head.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, I'll be sworn.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">It were no match, your nail against his horn.</div>
                              <div class="line">May I, sweet lady, beg a kiss of you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">You may.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">I do desire it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, beg, then.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">Why then for Venus' sake, give me a kiss,</div>
                              <div class="line">When Helen is a maid again, and his.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">I am your debtor, claim it when 'tis due.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">Never's my day, and then a kiss of you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Lady, a word: I'll bring you to your father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit with CRESSIDA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">A woman of quick sense.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, fie upon her!</div>
                              <div class="line">There's language in her eye, her cheek, her lip,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, her foot speaks; her wanton spirits look out</div>
                              <div class="line">At every joint and motive of her body.</div>
                              <div class="line">O, these encounterers, so glib of tongue,</div>
                              <div class="line">That give accosting welcome ere it comes,</div>
                              <div class="line">And wide unclasp the tables of their thoughts</div>
                              <div class="line">To every ticklish reader! set them down</div>
                              <div class="line">For sluttish spoils of opportunity</div>
                              <div class="line">And daughters of the game.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Trumpet within</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALL</div>
                              <div class="line">The Trojans' trumpet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">Yonder comes the troop.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter HECTOR, armed; AENEAS, TROILUS, and other
Trojans, with Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hail, all you state of Greece! what shall be done</div>
                              <div class="line">To him that victory commands? or do you purpose</div>
                              <div class="line">A victor shall be known? will you the knights</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall to the edge of all extremity</div>
                              <div class="line">Pursue each other, or shall be divided</div>
                              <div class="line">By any voice or order of the field?</div>
                              <div class="line">Hector bade ask.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">Which way would Hector have it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">He cares not; he'll obey conditions.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis done like Hector; but securely done,</div>
                              <div class="line">A little proudly, and great deal misprizing</div>
                              <div class="line">The knight opposed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">If not Achilles, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">What is your name?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">If not Achilles, nothing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore Achilles: but, whate'er, know this:</div>
                              <div class="line">In the extremity of great and little,</div>
                              <div class="line">Valour and pride excel themselves in Hector;</div>
                              <div class="line">The one almost as infinite as all,</div>
                              <div class="line">The other blank as nothing. Weigh him well,</div>
                              <div class="line">And that which looks like pride is courtesy.</div>
                              <div class="line">This Ajax is half made of Hector's blood:</div>
                              <div class="line">In love whereof, half Hector stays at home;</div>
                              <div class="line">Half heart, half hand, half Hector comes to seek</div>
                              <div class="line">This blended knight, half Trojan and half Greek.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">A maiden battle, then? O, I perceive you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter DIOMEDES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is Sir Diomed. Go, gentle knight,</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand by our Ajax: as you and Lord AEneas</div>
                              <div class="line">Consent upon the order of their fight,</div>
                              <div class="line">So be it; either to the uttermost,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else a breath: the combatants being kin</div>
                              <div class="line">Half stints their strife before their strokes begin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>AJAX and HECTOR enter the lists</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">They are opposed already.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">What Trojan is that same that looks so heavy?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">The youngest son of Priam, a true knight,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not yet mature, yet matchless, firm of word,</div>
                              <div class="line">Speaking in deeds and deedless in his tongue;</div>
                              <div class="line">Not soon provoked nor being provoked soon calm'd:</div>
                              <div class="line">His heart and hand both open and both free;</div>
                              <div class="line">For what he has he gives, what thinks he shows;</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet gives he not till judgment guide his bounty,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor dignifies an impure thought with breath;</div>
                              <div class="line">Manly as Hector, but more dangerous;</div>
                              <div class="line">For Hector in his blaze of wrath subscribes</div>
                              <div class="line">To tender objects, but he in heat of action</div>
                              <div class="line">Is more vindicative than jealous love:</div>
                              <div class="line">They call him Troilus, and on him erect</div>
                              <div class="line">A second hope, as fairly built as Hector.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus says AEneas; one that knows the youth</div>
                              <div class="line">Even to his inches, and with private soul</div>
                              <div class="line">Did in great Ilion thus translate him to me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Alarum. Hector and Ajax fight</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">They are in action.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, Ajax, hold thine own!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hector, thou sleep'st;</div>
                              <div class="line">Awake thee!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">His blows are well disposed: there, Ajax!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">You must no more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Trumpets cease</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Princes, enough, so please you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">I am not warm yet; let us fight again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">As Hector pleases.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then will I no more:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art, great lord, my father's sister's son,</div>
                              <div class="line">A cousin-german to great Priam's seed;</div>
                              <div class="line">The obligation of our blood forbids</div>
                              <div class="line">A gory emulation 'twixt us twain:</div>
                              <div class="line">Were thy commixtion Greek and Trojan so</div>
                              <div class="line">That thou couldst say 'This hand is Grecian all,</div>
                              <div class="line">And this is Trojan; the sinews of this leg</div>
                              <div class="line">All Greek, and this all Troy; my mother's blood</div>
                              <div class="line">Runs on the dexter cheek, and this sinister</div>
                              <div class="line">Bounds in my father's;' by Jove multipotent,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou shouldst not bear from me a Greekish member</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein my sword had not impressure made</div>
                              <div class="line">Of our rank feud: but the just gods gainsay</div>
                              <div class="line">That any drop thou borrow'dst from thy mother,</div>
                              <div class="line">My sacred aunt, should by my mortal sword</div>
                              <div class="line">Be drain'd! Let me embrace thee, Ajax:</div>
                              <div class="line">By him that thunders, thou hast lusty arms;</div>
                              <div class="line">Hector would have them fall upon him thus:</div>
                              <div class="line">Cousin, all honour to thee!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank thee, Hector</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art too gentle and too free a man:</div>
                              <div class="line">I came to kill thee, cousin, and bear hence</div>
                              <div class="line">A great addition earned in thy death.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Not Neoptolemus so mirable,</div>
                              <div class="line">On whose bright crest Fame with her loud'st Oyes</div>
                              <div class="line">Cries 'This is he,' could promise to himself</div>
                              <div class="line">A thought of added honour torn from Hector.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">There is expectance here from both the sides,</div>
                              <div class="line">What further you will do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll answer it;</div>
                              <div class="line">The issue is embracement: Ajax, farewell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">If I might in entreaties find success--</div>
                              <div class="line">As seld I have the chance--I would desire</div>
                              <div class="line">My famous cousin to our Grecian tents.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis Agamemnon's wish, and great Achilles</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth long to see unarm'd the valiant Hector.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">AEneas, call my brother Troilus to me,</div>
                              <div class="line">And signify this loving interview</div>
                              <div class="line">To the expecters of our Trojan part;</div>
                              <div class="line">Desire them home. Give me thy hand, my cousin;</div>
                              <div class="line">I will go eat with thee and see your knights.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Great Agamemnon comes to meet us here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">The worthiest of them tell me name by name;</div>
                              <div class="line">But for Achilles, mine own searching eyes</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall find him by his large and portly size.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">Worthy of arms! as welcome as to one</div>
                              <div class="line">That would be rid of such an enemy;</div>
                              <div class="line">But that's no welcome: understand more clear,</div>
                              <div class="line">What's past and what's to come is strew'd with husks</div>
                              <div class="line">And formless ruin of oblivion;</div>
                              <div class="line">But in this extant moment, faith and troth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Strain'd purely from all hollow bias-drawing,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bids thee, with most divine integrity,</div>
                              <div class="line">From heart of very heart, great Hector, welcome.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank thee, most imperious Agamemnon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To TROILUS</span>  My well-famed lord of Troy, no</div>
                              <div class="line">less to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENELAUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me confirm my princely brother's greeting:</div>
                              <div class="line">You brace of warlike brothers, welcome hither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Who must we answer?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">The noble Menelaus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">O, you, my lord? by Mars his gauntlet, thanks!</div>
                              <div class="line">Mock not, that I affect the untraded oath;</div>
                              <div class="line">Your quondam wife swears still by Venus' glove:</div>
                              <div class="line">She's well, but bade me not commend her to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENELAUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Name her not now, sir; she's a deadly theme.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">O, pardon; I offend.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">I have, thou gallant Trojan, seen thee oft</div>
                              <div class="line">Labouring for destiny make cruel way</div>
                              <div class="line">Through ranks of Greekish youth, and I have seen thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">As hot as Perseus, spur thy Phrygian steed,</div>
                              <div class="line">Despising many forfeits and subduements,</div>
                              <div class="line">When thou hast hung thy advanced sword i' the air,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not letting it decline on the declined,</div>
                              <div class="line">That I have said to some my standers by</div>
                              <div class="line">'Lo, Jupiter is yonder, dealing life!'</div>
                              <div class="line">And I have seen thee pause and take thy breath,</div>
                              <div class="line">When that a ring of Greeks have hemm'd thee in,</div>
                              <div class="line">Like an Olympian wrestling: this have I seen;</div>
                              <div class="line">But this thy countenance, still lock'd in steel,</div>
                              <div class="line">I never saw till now. I knew thy grandsire,</div>
                              <div class="line">And once fought with him: he was a soldier good;</div>
                              <div class="line">But, by great Mars, the captain of us all,</div>
                              <div class="line">Never saw like thee. Let an old man embrace thee;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, worthy warrior, welcome to our tents.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis the old Nestor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me embrace thee, good old chronicle,</div>
                              <div class="line">That hast so long walk'd hand in hand with time:</div>
                              <div class="line">Most reverend Nestor, I am glad to clasp thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">I would my arms could match thee in contention,</div>
                              <div class="line">As they contend with thee in courtesy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">I would they could.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha!</div>
                              <div class="line">By this white beard, I'ld fight with thee to-morrow.</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, welcome, welcome! I have seen the time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">I wonder now how yonder city stands</div>
                              <div class="line">When we have here her base and pillar by us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">I know your favour, Lord Ulysses, well.</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, sir, there's many a Greek and Trojan dead,</div>
                              <div class="line">Since first I saw yourself and Diomed</div>
                              <div class="line">In Ilion, on your Greekish embassy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I foretold you then what would ensue:</div>
                              <div class="line">My prophecy is but half his journey yet;</div>
                              <div class="line">For yonder walls, that pertly front your town,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yond towers, whose wanton tops do buss the clouds,</div>
                              <div class="line">Must kiss their own feet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">I must not believe you:</div>
                              <div class="line">There they stand yet, and modestly I think,</div>
                              <div class="line">The fall of every Phrygian stone will cost</div>
                              <div class="line">A drop of Grecian blood: the end crowns all,</div>
                              <div class="line">And that old common arbitrator, Time,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will one day end it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">So to him we leave it.</div>
                              <div class="line">Most gentle and most valiant Hector, welcome:</div>
                              <div class="line">After the general, I beseech you next</div>
                              <div class="line">To feast with me and see me at my tent.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall forestall thee, Lord Ulysses, thou!</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, Hector, I have fed mine eyes on thee;</div>
                              <div class="line">I have with exact view perused thee, Hector,</div>
                              <div class="line">And quoted joint by joint.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Is this Achilles?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I am Achilles.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand fair, I pray thee: let me look on thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Behold thy fill.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, I have done already.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art too brief: I will the second time,</div>
                              <div class="line">As I would buy thee, view thee limb by limb.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">O, like a book of sport thou'lt read me o'er;</div>
                              <div class="line">But there's more in me than thou understand'st.</div>
                              <div class="line">Why dost thou so oppress me with thine eye?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell me, you heavens, in which part of his body</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I destroy him? whether there, or there, or there?</div>
                              <div class="line">That I may give the local wound a name</div>
                              <div class="line">And make distinct the very breach whereout</div>
                              <div class="line">Hector's great spirit flew: answer me, heavens!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">It would discredit the blest gods, proud man,</div>
                              <div class="line">To answer such a question: stand again:</div>
                              <div class="line">Think'st thou to catch my life so pleasantly</div>
                              <div class="line">As to prenominate in nice conjecture</div>
                              <div class="line">Where thou wilt hit me dead?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I tell thee, yea.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Wert thou an oracle to tell me so,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'd not believe thee. Henceforth guard thee well;</div>
                              <div class="line">For I'll not kill thee there, nor there, nor there;</div>
                              <div class="line">But, by the forge that stithied Mars his helm,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll kill thee every where, yea, o'er and o'er.</div>
                              <div class="line">You wisest Grecians, pardon me this brag;</div>
                              <div class="line">His insolence draws folly from my lips;</div>
                              <div class="line">But I'll endeavour deeds to match these words,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or may I never--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not chafe thee, cousin:</div>
                              <div class="line">And you, Achilles, let these threats alone,</div>
                              <div class="line">Till accident or purpose bring you to't:</div>
                              <div class="line">You may have every day enough of Hector</div>
                              <div class="line">If you have stomach; the general state, I fear,</div>
                              <div class="line">Can scarce entreat you to be odd with him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, let us see you in the field:</div>
                              <div class="line">We have had pelting wars, since you refused</div>
                              <div class="line">The Grecians' cause.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou entreat me, Hector?</div>
                              <div class="line">To-morrow do I meet thee, fell as death;</div>
                              <div class="line">To-night all friends.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy hand upon that match.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">First, all you peers of Greece, go to my tent;</div>
                              <div class="line">There in the full convive we: afterwards,</div>
                              <div class="line">As Hector's leisure and your bounties shall</div>
                              <div class="line">Concur together, severally entreat him.</div>
                              <div class="line">Beat loud the tabourines, let the trumpets blow,</div>
                              <div class="line">That this great soldier may his welcome know.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt all except TROILUS and ULYSSES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">My Lord Ulysses, tell me, I beseech you,</div>
                              <div class="line">In what place of the field doth Calchas keep?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">At Menelaus' tent, most princely Troilus:</div>
                              <div class="line">There Diomed doth feast with him to-night;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who neither looks upon the heaven nor earth,</div>
                              <div class="line">But gives all gaze and bent of amorous view</div>
                              <div class="line">On the fair Cressid.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall sweet lord, be bound to you so much,</div>
                              <div class="line">After we part from Agamemnon's tent,</div>
                              <div class="line">To bring me thither?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall command me, sir.</div>
                              <div class="line">As gentle tell me, of what honour was</div>
                              <div class="line">This Cressida in Troy? Had she no lover there</div>
                              <div class="line">That wails her absence?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O, sir, to such as boasting show their scars</div>
                              <div class="line">A mock is due. Will you walk on, my lord?</div>
                              <div class="line">She was beloved, she loved; she is, and doth:</div>
                              <div class="line">But still sweet love is food for fortune's tooth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.8">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 5. ACT V</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.8.2">1. SCENE I.  The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.8.3">2. SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.8.4">3. SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.8.5">4. SCENE IV.  Plains between Troy and the Grecian camp.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.8.6">5. SCENE V.  Another part of the plains.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.8.7">6. SCENE VI.  Another part of the plains.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.8.8">7. SCENE VII.  Another part of the plains.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.8.9">8. SCENE VIII.  Another part of the plains.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.8.10">9. SCENE IX.  Another part of the plains.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.8.11">10. SCENE X.  Another part of the plains.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.8.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter ACHILLES and PATROCLUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll heat his blood with Greekish wine to-night,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which with my scimitar I'll cool to-morrow.</div>
                              <div class="line">Patroclus, let us feast him to the height.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes Thersites.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter THERSITES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, thou core of envy!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou crusty batch of nature, what's the news?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, thou picture of what thou seemest, and idol</div>
                              <div class="line">of idiot worshippers, here's a letter for thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">From whence, fragment?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, thou full dish of fool, from Troy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Who keeps the tent now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">The surgeon's box, or the patient's wound.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well said, adversity! and what need these tricks?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, be silent, boy; I profit not by thy talk:</div>
                              <div class="line">thou art thought to be Achilles' male varlet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Male varlet, you rogue! what's that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, his masculine whore. Now, the rotten diseases</div>
                              <div class="line">of the south, the guts-griping, ruptures, catarrhs,</div>
                              <div class="line">loads o' gravel i' the back, lethargies, cold</div>
                              <div class="line">palsies, raw eyes, dirt-rotten livers, wheezing</div>
                              <div class="line">lungs, bladders full of imposthume, sciaticas,</div>
                              <div class="line">limekilns i' the palm, incurable bone-ache, and the</div>
                              <div class="line">rivelled fee-simple of the tetter, take and take</div>
                              <div class="line">again such preposterous discoveries!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why thou damnable box of envy, thou, what meanest</div>
                              <div class="line">thou to curse thus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Do I curse thee?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why no, you ruinous butt, you whoreson</div>
                              <div class="line">indistinguishable cur, no.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">No! why art thou then exasperate, thou idle</div>
                              <div class="line">immaterial skein of sleave-silk, thou green sarcenet</div>
                              <div class="line">flap for a sore eye, thou tassel of a prodigal's</div>
                              <div class="line">purse, thou? Ah, how the poor world is pestered</div>
                              <div class="line">with such waterflies, diminutives of nature!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PATROCLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Out, gall!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Finch-egg!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">My sweet Patroclus, I am thwarted quite</div>
                              <div class="line">From my great purpose in to-morrow's battle.</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is a letter from Queen Hecuba,</div>
                              <div class="line">A token from her daughter, my fair love,</div>
                              <div class="line">Both taxing me and gaging me to keep</div>
                              <div class="line">An oath that I have sworn. I will not break it:</div>
                              <div class="line">Fall Greeks; fail fame; honour or go or stay;</div>
                              <div class="line">My major vow lies here, this I'll obey.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, Thersites, help to trim my tent:</div>
                              <div class="line">This night in banqueting must all be spent.</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, Patroclus!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt ACHILLES and PATROCLUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">With too much blood and too little brain, these two</div>
                              <div class="line">may run mad; but, if with too much brain and too</div>
                              <div class="line">little blood they do, I'll be a curer of madmen.</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's Agamemnon, an honest fellow enough and one</div>
                              <div class="line">that loves quails; but he has not so much brain as</div>
                              <div class="line">earwax: and the goodly transformation of Jupiter</div>
                              <div class="line">there, his brother, the bull,--the primitive statue,</div>
                              <div class="line">and oblique memorial of cuckolds; a thrifty</div>
                              <div class="line">shoeing-horn in a chain, hanging at his brother's</div>
                              <div class="line">leg,--to what form but that he is, should wit larded</div>
                              <div class="line">with malice and malice forced with wit turn him to?</div>
                              <div class="line">To an ass, were nothing; he is both ass and ox: to</div>
                              <div class="line">an ox, were nothing; he is both ox and ass. To be a</div>
                              <div class="line">dog, a mule, a cat, a fitchew, a toad, a lizard, an</div>
                              <div class="line">owl, a puttock, or a herring without a roe, I would</div>
                              <div class="line">not care; but to be Menelaus, I would conspire</div>
                              <div class="line">against destiny. Ask me not, what I would be, if I</div>
                              <div class="line">were not Thersites; for I care not to be the louse</div>
                              <div class="line">of a lazar, so I were not Menelaus! Hey-day!</div>
                              <div class="line">spirits and fires!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter HECTOR, TROILUS, AJAX, AGAMEMNON, ULYSSES,
NESTOR, MENELAUS, and DIOMEDES, with lights</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">We go wrong, we go wrong.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">No, yonder 'tis;</div>
                              <div class="line">There, where we see the lights.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">I trouble you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">No, not a whit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes himself to guide you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter ACHILLES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome, brave Hector; welcome, princes all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">So now, fair prince of Troy, I bid good night.</div>
                              <div class="line">Ajax commands the guard to tend on you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Thanks and good night to the Greeks' general.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENELAUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Good night, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Good night, sweet lord Menelaus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet draught: 'sweet' quoth 'a! sweet sink,</div>
                              <div class="line">sweet sewer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Good night and welcome, both at once, to those</div>
                              <div class="line">That go or tarry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">Good night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt AGAMEMNON and MENELAUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Old Nestor tarries; and you too, Diomed,</div>
                              <div class="line">Keep Hector company an hour or two.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot, lord; I have important business,</div>
                              <div class="line">The tide whereof is now. Good night, great Hector.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me your hand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to TROILUS</span>  Follow his torch; he goes to</div>
                              <div class="line">Calchas' tent:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll keep you company.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet sir, you honour me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">And so, good night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit DIOMEDES; ULYSSES and TROILUS following</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, enter my tent.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt ACHILLES, HECTOR, AJAX, and NESTOR</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">That same Diomed's a false-hearted rogue, a most</div>
                              <div class="line">unjust knave; I will no more trust him when he leers</div>
                              <div class="line">than I will a serpent when he hisses: he will spend</div>
                              <div class="line">his mouth, and promise, like Brabbler the hound:</div>
                              <div class="line">but when he performs, astronomers foretell it; it</div>
                              <div class="line">is prodigious, there will come some change; the sun</div>
                              <div class="line">borrows of the moon, when Diomed keeps his</div>
                              <div class="line">word. I will rather leave to see Hector, than</div>
                              <div class="line">not to dog him: they say he keeps a Trojan</div>
                              <div class="line">drab, and uses the traitor Calchas' tent: I'll</div>
                              <div class="line">after. Nothing but lechery! all incontinent varlets!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.8.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter DIOMEDES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">What, are you up here, ho? speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALCHAS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Who calls?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Calchas, I think. Where's your daughter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALCHAS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  She comes to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter TROILUS and ULYSSES, at a distance;
after them, THERSITES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand where the torch may not discover us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter CRESSIDA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Cressid comes forth to him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, my charge!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, my sweet guardian! Hark, a word with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Whispers</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, so familiar!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">She will sing any man at first sight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">And any man may sing her, if he can take her cliff;</div>
                              <div class="line">she's noted.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you remember?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
