                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Remember! yes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, but do, then;</div>
                              <div class="line">And let your mind be coupled with your words.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What should she remember?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">List.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet honey Greek, tempt me no more to folly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Roguery!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, then,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll tell you what,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Foh, foh! come, tell a pin: you are forsworn.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">In faith, I cannot: what would you have me do?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">A juggling trick,--to be secretly open.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">What did you swear you would bestow on me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, do not hold me to mine oath;</div>
                              <div class="line">Bid me do any thing but that, sweet Greek.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Good night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold, patience!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, Trojan!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Diomed,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">No, no, good night: I'll be your fool no more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy better must.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Hark, one word in your ear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O plague and madness!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">You are moved, prince; let us depart, I pray you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lest your displeasure should enlarge itself</div>
                              <div class="line">To wrathful terms: this place is dangerous;</div>
                              <div class="line">The time right deadly; I beseech you, go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Behold, I pray you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, good my lord, go off:</div>
                              <div class="line">You flow to great distraction; come, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray thee, stay.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">You have not patience; come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, stay; by hell and all hell's torments</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not speak a word!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">And so, good night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, but you part in anger.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth that grieve thee?</div>
                              <div class="line">O wither'd truth!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, how now, lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By Jove,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will be patient.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Guardian!--why, Greek!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Foh, foh! adieu; you palter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">In faith, I do not: come hither once again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">You shake, my lord, at something: will you go?</div>
                              <div class="line">You will break out.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">She strokes his cheek!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, stay; by Jove, I will not speak a word:</div>
                              <div class="line">There is between my will and all offences</div>
                              <div class="line">A guard of patience: stay a little while.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">How the devil Luxury, with his fat rump and</div>
                              <div class="line">potato-finger, tickles these together! Fry, lechery, fry!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">But will you, then?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">In faith, I will, la; never trust me else.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me some token for the surety of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll fetch you one.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">You have sworn patience.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Fear me not, sweet lord;</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not be myself, nor have cognition</div>
                              <div class="line">Of what I feel: I am all patience.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter CRESSIDA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Now the pledge; now, now, now!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, Diomed, keep this sleeve.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O beauty! where is thy faith?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I will be patient; outwardly I will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">You look upon that sleeve; behold it well.</div>
                              <div class="line">He loved me--O false wench!--Give't me again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose was't?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">It is no matter, now I have't again.</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not meet with you to-morrow night:</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, Diomed, visit me no more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Now she sharpens: well said, whetstone!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall have it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">What, this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, that.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, all you gods! O pretty, pretty pledge!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy master now lies thinking in his bed</div>
                              <div class="line">Of thee and me, and sighs, and takes my glove,</div>
                              <div class="line">And gives memorial dainty kisses to it,</div>
                              <div class="line">As I kiss thee. Nay, do not snatch it from me;</div>
                              <div class="line">He that takes that doth take my heart withal.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">I had your heart before, this follows it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I did swear patience.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall not have it, Diomed; faith, you shall not;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll give you something else.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">I will have this: whose was it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">It is no matter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, tell me whose it was.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas one's that loved me better than you will.</div>
                              <div class="line">But, now you have it, take it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose was it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">By all Diana's waiting-women yond,</div>
                              <div class="line">And by herself, I will not tell you whose.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">To-morrow will I wear it on my helm,</div>
                              <div class="line">And grieve his spirit that dares not challenge it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Wert thou the devil, and worest it on thy horn,</div>
                              <div class="line">It should be challenged.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, well, 'tis done, 'tis past: and yet it is not;</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not keep my word.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then, farewell;</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou never shalt mock Diomed again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall not go: one cannot speak a word,</div>
                              <div class="line">But it straight starts you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not like this fooling.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor I, by Pluto: but that that likes not you pleases me best.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">What, shall I come? the hour?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, come:--O Jove!--do come:--I shall be plagued.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell till then.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CRESSIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Good night: I prithee, come.</div>
                              <p>Exit DIOMEDES</p>
                              <div class="line">Troilus, farewell! one eye yet looks on thee</div>
                              <div class="line">But with my heart the other eye doth see.</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, poor our sex! this fault in us I find,</div>
                              <div class="line">The error of our eye directs our mind:</div>
                              <div class="line">What error leads must err; O, then conclude</div>
                              <div class="line">Minds sway'd by eyes are full of turpitude.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">A proof of strength she could not publish more,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless she said ' My mind is now turn'd whore.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">All's done, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">Why stay we, then?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">To make a recordation to my soul</div>
                              <div class="line">Of every syllable that here was spoke.</div>
                              <div class="line">But if I tell how these two did co-act,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I not lie in publishing a truth?</div>
                              <div class="line">Sith yet there is a credence in my heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">An esperance so obstinately strong,</div>
                              <div class="line">That doth invert the attest of eyes and ears,</div>
                              <div class="line">As if those organs had deceptious functions,</div>
                              <div class="line">Created only to calumniate.</div>
                              <div class="line">Was Cressid here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot conjure, Trojan.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">She was not, sure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">Most sure she was.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, my negation hath no taste of madness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor mine, my lord: Cressid was here but now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Let it not be believed for womanhood!</div>
                              <div class="line">Think, we had mothers; do not give advantage</div>
                              <div class="line">To stubborn critics, apt, without a theme,</div>
                              <div class="line">For depravation, to square the general sex</div>
                              <div class="line">By Cressid's rule: rather think this not Cressid.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">What hath she done, prince, that can soil our mothers?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing at all, unless that this were she.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Will he swagger himself out on's own eyes?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">This she? no, this is Diomed's Cressida:</div>
                              <div class="line">If beauty have a soul, this is not she;</div>
                              <div class="line">If souls guide vows, if vows be sanctimonies,</div>
                              <div class="line">If sanctimony be the gods' delight,</div>
                              <div class="line">If there be rule in unity itself,</div>
                              <div class="line">This is not she. O madness of discourse,</div>
                              <div class="line">That cause sets up with and against itself!</div>
                              <div class="line">Bi-fold authority! where reason can revolt</div>
                              <div class="line">Without perdition, and loss assume all reason</div>
                              <div class="line">Without revolt: this is, and is not, Cressid.</div>
                              <div class="line">Within my soul there doth conduce a fight</div>
                              <div class="line">Of this strange nature that a thing inseparate</div>
                              <div class="line">Divides more wider than the sky and earth,</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet the spacious breadth of this division</div>
                              <div class="line">Admits no orifex for a point as subtle</div>
                              <div class="line">As Ariachne's broken woof to enter.</div>
                              <div class="line">Instance, O instance! strong as Pluto's gates;</div>
                              <div class="line">Cressid is mine, tied with the bonds of heaven:</div>
                              <div class="line">Instance, O instance! strong as heaven itself;</div>
                              <div class="line">The bonds of heaven are slipp'd, dissolved, and loosed;</div>
                              <div class="line">And with another knot, five-finger-tied,</div>
                              <div class="line">The fractions of her faith, orts of her love,</div>
                              <div class="line">The fragments, scraps, the bits and greasy relics</div>
                              <div class="line">Of her o'er-eaten faith, are bound to Diomed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">May worthy Troilus be half attach'd</div>
                              <div class="line">With that which here his passion doth express?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, Greek; and that shall be divulged well</div>
                              <div class="line">In characters as red as Mars his heart</div>
                              <div class="line">Inflamed with Venus: never did young man fancy</div>
                              <div class="line">With so eternal and so fix'd a soul.</div>
                              <div class="line">Hark, Greek: as much as I do Cressid love,</div>
                              <div class="line">So much by weight hate I her Diomed:</div>
                              <div class="line">That sleeve is mine that he'll bear on his helm;</div>
                              <div class="line">Were it a casque composed by Vulcan's skill,</div>
                              <div class="line">My sword should bite it: not the dreadful spout</div>
                              <div class="line">Which shipmen do the hurricano call,</div>
                              <div class="line">Constringed in mass by the almighty sun,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall dizzy with more clamour Neptune's ear</div>
                              <div class="line">In his descent than shall my prompted sword</div>
                              <div class="line">Falling on Diomed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">He'll tickle it for his concupy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O Cressid! O false Cressid! false, false, false!</div>
                              <div class="line">Let all untruths stand by thy stained name,</div>
                              <div class="line">And they'll seem glorious.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">O, contain yourself</div>
                              <div class="line">Your passion draws ears hither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter AENEAS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AENEAS</div>
                              <div class="line">I have been seeking you this hour, my lord:</div>
                              <div class="line">Hector, by this, is arming him in Troy;</div>
                              <div class="line">Ajax, your guard, stays to conduct you home.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Have with you, prince. My courteous lord, adieu.</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell, revolted fair! and, Diomed,</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand fast, and wear a castle on thy head!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll bring you to the gates.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Accept distracted thanks.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt TROILUS, AENEAS, and ULYSSES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Would I could meet that rogue Diomed! I would</div>
                              <div class="line">croak like a raven; I would bode, I would bode.</div>
                              <div class="line">Patroclus will give me any thing for the</div>
                              <div class="line">intelligence of this whore: the parrot will not</div>
                              <div class="line">do more for an almond than he for a commodious drab.</div>
                              <div class="line">Lechery, lechery; still, wars and lechery; nothing</div>
                              <div class="line">else holds fashion: a burning devil take them!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.8.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter HECTOR and ANDROMACHE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANDROMACHE</div>
                              <div class="line">When was my lord so much ungently temper'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">To stop his ears against admonishment?</div>
                              <div class="line">Unarm, unarm, and do not fight to-day.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">You train me to offend you; get you in:</div>
                              <div class="line">By all the everlasting gods, I'll go!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANDROMACHE</div>
                              <div class="line">My dreams will, sure, prove ominous to the day.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">No more, I say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter CASSANDRA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is my brother Hector?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANDROMACHE</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, sister; arm'd, and bloody in intent.</div>
                              <div class="line">Consort with me in loud and dear petition,</div>
                              <div class="line">Pursue we him on knees; for I have dream'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Of bloody turbulence, and this whole night</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath nothing been but shapes and forms of slaughter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, 'tis true.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Ho! bid my trumpet sound!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                              <div class="line">No notes of sally, for the heavens, sweet brother.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Be gone, I say: the gods have heard me swear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                              <div class="line">The gods are deaf to hot and peevish vows:</div>
                              <div class="line">They are polluted offerings, more abhorr'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Than spotted livers in the sacrifice.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANDROMACHE</div>
                              <div class="line">O, be persuaded! do not count it holy</div>
                              <div class="line">To hurt by being just: it is as lawful,</div>
                              <div class="line">For we would give much, to use violent thefts,</div>
                              <div class="line">And rob in the behalf of charity.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                              <div class="line">It is the purpose that makes strong the vow;</div>
                              <div class="line">But vows to every purpose must not hold:</div>
                              <div class="line">Unarm, sweet Hector.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold you still, I say;</div>
                              <div class="line">Mine honour keeps the weather of my fate:</div>
                              <div class="line">Lie every man holds dear; but the brave man</div>
                              <div class="line">Holds honour far more precious-dear than life.</div>
                              <p>Enter TROILUS</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, young man! mean'st thou to fight to-day?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANDROMACHE</div>
                              <div class="line">Cassandra, call my father to persuade.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit CASSANDRA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">No, faith, young Troilus; doff thy harness, youth;</div>
                              <div class="line">I am to-day i' the vein of chivalry:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let grow thy sinews till their knots be strong,</div>
                              <div class="line">And tempt not yet the brushes of the war.</div>
                              <div class="line">Unarm thee, go, and doubt thou not, brave boy,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll stand to-day for thee and me and Troy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Brother, you have a vice of mercy in you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which better fits a lion than a man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">What vice is that, good Troilus? chide me for it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">When many times the captive Grecian falls,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even in the fan and wind of your fair sword,</div>
                              <div class="line">You bid them rise, and live.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">O,'tis fair play.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Fool's play, by heaven, Hector.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">How now! how now!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">For the love of all the gods,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's leave the hermit pity with our mothers,</div>
                              <div class="line">And when we have our armours buckled on,</div>
                              <div class="line">The venom'd vengeance ride upon our swords,</div>
                              <div class="line">Spur them to ruthful work, rein them from ruth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, savage, fie!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hector, then 'tis wars.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Troilus, I would not have you fight to-day.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Who should withhold me?</div>
                              <div class="line">Not fate, obedience, nor the hand of Mars</div>
                              <div class="line">Beckoning with fiery truncheon my retire;</div>
                              <div class="line">Not Priamus and Hecuba on knees,</div>
                              <div class="line">Their eyes o'ergalled with recourse of tears;</div>
                              <div class="line">Not you, my brother, with your true sword drawn,</div>
                              <div class="line">Opposed to hinder me, should stop my way,</div>
                              <div class="line">But by my ruin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter CASSANDRA, with PRIAM</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                              <div class="line">Lay hold upon him, Priam, hold him fast:</div>
                              <div class="line">He is thy crutch; now if thou lose thy stay,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou on him leaning, and all Troy on thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">Fall all together.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRIAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, Hector, come, go back:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy wife hath dream'd; thy mother hath had visions;</div>
                              <div class="line">Cassandra doth foresee; and I myself</div>
                              <div class="line">Am like a prophet suddenly enrapt</div>
                              <div class="line">To tell thee that this day is ominous:</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore, come back.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">AEneas is a-field;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I do stand engaged to many Greeks,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even in the faith of valour, to appear</div>
                              <div class="line">This morning to them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRIAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, but thou shalt not go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">I must not break my faith.</div>
                              <div class="line">You know me dutiful; therefore, dear sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me not shame respect; but give me leave</div>
                              <div class="line">To take that course by your consent and voice,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which you do here forbid me, royal Priam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                              <div class="line">O Priam, yield not to him!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANDROMACHE</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not, dear father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Andromache, I am offended with you:</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the love you bear me, get you in.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit ANDROMACHE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">This foolish, dreaming, superstitious girl</div>
                              <div class="line">Makes all these bodements.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, farewell, dear Hector!</div>
                              <div class="line">Look, how thou diest! look, how thy eye turns pale!</div>
                              <div class="line">Look, how thy wounds do bleed at many vents!</div>
                              <div class="line">Hark, how Troy roars! how Hecuba cries out!</div>
                              <div class="line">How poor Andromache shrills her dolours forth!</div>
                              <div class="line">Behold, distraction, frenzy and amazement,</div>
                              <div class="line">Like witless antics, one another meet,</div>
                              <div class="line">And all cry, Hector! Hector's dead! O Hector!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Away! away!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSANDRA</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell: yet, soft! Hector! take my leave:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou dost thyself and all our Troy deceive.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">You are amazed, my liege, at her exclaim:</div>
                              <div class="line">Go in and cheer the town: we'll forth and fight,</div>
                              <div class="line">Do deeds worth praise and tell you them at night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRIAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell: the gods with safety stand about thee!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt severally PRIAM and HECTOR. Alarums</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">They are at it, hark! Proud Diomed, believe,</div>
                              <div class="line">I come to lose my arm, or win my sleeve.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter PANDARUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you hear, my lord? do you hear?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's a letter come from yond poor girl.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me read.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PANDARUS</div>
                              <div class="line">A whoreson tisick, a whoreson rascally tisick so</div>
                              <div class="line">troubles me, and the foolish fortune of this girl;</div>
                              <div class="line">and what one thing, what another, that I shall</div>
                              <div class="line">leave you one o' these days: and I have a rheum</div>
                              <div class="line">in mine eyes too, and such an ache in my bones</div>
                              <div class="line">that, unless a man were cursed, I cannot tell what</div>
                              <div class="line">to think on't. What says she there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Words, words, mere words, no matter from the heart:</div>
                              <div class="line">The effect doth operate another way.</div>
                              <p>Tearing the letter</p>
                              <div class="line">Go, wind, to wind, there turn and change together.</div>
                              <div class="line">My love with words and errors still she feeds;</div>
                              <div class="line">But edifies another with her deeds.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt severally</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.8.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  Plains between Troy and the Grecian camp.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Alarums: excursions. Enter THERSITES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Now they are clapper-clawing one another; I'll go</div>
                              <div class="line">look on. That dissembling abominable varlets Diomed,</div>
                              <div class="line">has got that same scurvy doting foolish young knave's</div>
                              <div class="line">sleeve of Troy there in his helm: I would fain see</div>
                              <div class="line">them meet; that that same young Trojan ass, that</div>
                              <div class="line">loves the whore there, might send that Greekish</div>
                              <div class="line">whore-masterly villain, with the sleeve, back to the</div>
                              <div class="line">dissembling luxurious drab, of a sleeveless errand.</div>
                              <div class="line">O' the t'other side, the policy of those crafty</div>
                              <div class="line">swearing rascals, that stale old mouse-eaten dry</div>
                              <div class="line">cheese, Nestor, and that same dog-fox, Ulysses, is</div>
                              <div class="line">not proved worthy a blackberry: they set me up, in</div>
                              <div class="line">policy, that mongrel cur, Ajax, against that dog of</div>
                              <div class="line">as bad a kind, Achilles: and now is the cur Ajax</div>
                              <div class="line">prouder than the cur Achilles, and will not arm</div>
                              <div class="line">to-day; whereupon the Grecians begin to proclaim</div>
                              <div class="line">barbarism, and policy grows into an ill opinion.</div>
                              <div class="line">Soft! here comes sleeve, and t'other.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter DIOMEDES, TROILUS following</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TROILUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Fly not; for shouldst thou take the river Styx,</div>
                              <div class="line">I would swim after.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou dost miscall retire:</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not fly, but advantageous care</div>
                              <div class="line">Withdrew me from the odds of multitude:</div>
                              <div class="line">Have at thee!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold thy whore, Grecian!--now for thy whore,</div>
                              <div class="line">Trojan!--now the sleeve, now the sleeve!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt TROILUS and DIOMEDES, fighting</p>
                        <p>Enter HECTOR</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">What art thou, Greek? art thou for Hector's match?</div>
                              <div class="line">Art thou of blood and honour?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">No, no, I am a rascal; a scurvy railing knave:</div>
                              <div class="line">a very filthy rogue.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HECTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">I do believe thee: live.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THERSITES</div>
                              <div class="line">God-a-mercy, that thou wilt believe me; but a</div>
                              <div class="line">plague break thy neck for frightening me! What's</div>
                              <div class="line">become of the wenching rogues? I think they have</div>
                              <div class="line">swallowed one another: I would laugh at that</div>
                              <div class="line">miracle: yet, in a sort, lechery eats itself.</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll seek them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.8.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE V.  Another part of the plains.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter DIOMEDES and a Servant</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, go, my servant, take thou Troilus' horse;</div>
                              <div class="line">Present the fair steed to my lady Cressid:</div>
                              <div class="line">Fellow, commend my service to her beauty;</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell her I have chastised the amorous Trojan,</div>
                              <div class="line">And am her knight by proof.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">I go, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <p>Enter AGAMEMNON</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AGAMEMNON</div>
                              <div class="line">Renew, renew! The fierce Polydamas</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath beat down Menon: bastard Margarelon</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath Doreus prisoner,</div>
                              <div class="line">And stands colossus-wise, waving his beam,</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the pashed corses of the kings</div>
                              <div class="line">Epistrophus and Cedius: Polyxenes is slain,</div>
                              <div class="line">Amphimachus and Thoas deadly hurt,</div>
                              <div class="line">Patroclus ta'en or slain, and Palamedes</div>
                              <div class="line">Sore hurt and bruised: the dreadful Sagittary</div>
                              <div class="line">Appals our numbers: haste we, Diomed,</div>
                              <div class="line">To reinforcement, or we perish all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter NESTOR</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, bear Patroclus' body to Achilles;</div>
                              <div class="line">And bid the snail-paced Ajax arm for shame.</div>
                              <div class="line">There is a thousand Hectors in the field:</div>
                              <div class="line">Now here he fights on Galathe his horse,</div>
                              <div class="line">And there lacks work; anon he's there afoot,</div>
                              <div class="line">And there they fly or die, like scaled sculls</div>
                              <div class="line">Before the belching whale; then is he yonder,</div>
                              <div class="line">And there the strawy Greeks, ripe for his edge,</div>
                              <div class="line">Fall down before him, like the mower's swath:</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, there, and every where, he leaves and takes,</div>
                              <div class="line">Dexterity so obeying appetite</div>
                              <div class="line">That what he will he does, and does so much</div>
                              <div class="line">That proof is call'd impossibility.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ULYSSES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ULYSSES</div>
                              <div class="line">O, courage, courage, princes! great Achilles</div>
                              <div class="line">Is arming, weeping, cursing, vowing vengeance:</div>
                              <div class="line">Patroclus' wounds have roused his drowsy blood,</div>
                              <div class="line">Together with his mangled Myrmidons,</div>
                              <div class="line">That noseless, handless, hack'd and chipp'd, come to him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Crying on Hector. Ajax hath lost a friend</div>
                              <div class="line">And foams at mouth, and he is arm'd and at it,</div>
                              <div class="line">Roaring for Troilus, who hath done to-day</div>
                              <div class="line">Mad and fantastic execution,</div>
                              <div class="line">Engaging and redeeming of himself</div>
                              <div class="line">With such a careless force and forceless care</div>
                              <div class="line">As if that luck, in very spite of cunning,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bade him win all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter AJAX</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Troilus! thou coward Troilus!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIOMEDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, there, there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NESTOR</div>
                              <div class="line">So, so, we draw together.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ACHILLES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ACHILLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is this Hector?</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, thou boy-queller, show thy face;</div>
                              <div class="line">Know what it is to meet Achilles angry:</div>
                              <div class="line">Hector? where's Hector? I will none but Hector.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.8.7">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>6. SCENE VI.  Another part of the plains.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter AJAX</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AJAX</div>
                              <div class="line">Troilus, thou coward Troilus, show thy head!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter DIOMEDES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
